title: FP-45 Liberator
text:
FP-45 Liberator ye pistoli ye min dilannen don Ameriki sɔrɔdasiw fɛ diɲɛ kɛlɛba filanan waati la walasa ka baara kɛ ni a ye kɛlɛcɛw fɛ jamana minɛlenw na. Liberator ma di abada Ameriki walima jɛkulu wɛrɛw ka sɔrɔdasiw ma, wa sɛbɛn caman bɛ yen minnu b’a jira ko marifa in kɛra a laɲini ye; hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ mɔgɔ minnu tun laɲininen don, n’olu ye sariya tiɲɛbaliw ye ani kɛlɛcɛw, olu tun man teli ka sɛbɛn caman mara k’a sababu kɛ faratiw ye minnu bɛ sɔrɔ a kɔnɔ ni sɛbɛnw minɛna jugu fɛ. FP-45 pistolet damadɔw de tila-tila i n’a fɔ a tun labɛnna cogo min na, wa u fanba tiɲɛna jɛkuluw ka sɔrɔdasiw fɛ kɛlɛ kɔfɛ.

FP-45 tun ye pistoli nɔgɔlen ye, min tun bɛ se ka ci siɲɛ kelen, min tun dilannen don walasa a sɔngɔ ka dɔgɔ ani a ka teliya ka dilan jamaba la. A tun bɛ ni nɛgɛ yɔrɔ 23 dɔrɔn ye minnu fanba tun ye taamasiyɛn ye ani minnu jiginna, minnu sɔngɔ man gɛlɛn ani minnu dilanni tun ka nɔgɔn. A ye .45 ACP pistolet cartouche ci ka bɔ barika la min tɛ marifa la. O dantigɛli in kosɔn, a tun dabɔra baara kama yɔrɔ surun na, yaada 1–4 (mɛtɛrɛ 1–4). A ka se ka baara kɛ cogo min na, o tun bɛ se mɛtɛrɛ 8 ɲɔgɔn dɔrɔn ma. Ni marifa tun bɛ yɔrɔ jan, marifa tun bɛna daminɛ ka bin ani ka bɔ sira kan. FP-45 musaka fɔlɔ min dira, o tun ye dɔrɔmɛ 2,10 ye/a kelen (o bɛ bɛn dɔrɔmɛ 35 ma san 2021), o ye tɔgɔla tɔgɔ juru don a la ko "Woolworth pistol". Marifa duuru tun bɛ se ka mara pistoli minɛyɔrɔ la.

FP-45 pistolet ba kɛmɛ bilala Sinuwa jamana na san 1943, nka u hakɛ min tilalen don tiɲɛ na, o ma dɔn fɔlɔ. U damadɔw tila-tilalen don Filipine jamana ka sɔrɔdasikulu, Filipine jamana ka sɔrɔdasikulu ani kɛlɛcɛw ma minnu bɛ kɛlɛ kɛ
Amerika

title: Balasahebanchi Shiv Sena ye baara kɛ
text:
Balasahebanchi Shiv Sena     Ɛndujamana politikitɔn ye min sigira senkan san 2022 Eknath Shinde ka ɲɛmɔgɔya kɔrɔ. taamasiyɛn kura dira a ma kalata jɛkulu fɛ, min ni Shiv Sena kunba tɛ kelen ye . Sisan a ye kulu fila danfaralenw dɔ ye, tɔ kelen ye Shiv Sena (Uddhav Balasaheb Thackeray) ye . o kuluw sigira senkan san 2022 Maharashtra politiki gɛlɛya sababu la . sisan a ye fanga sinamatɔn ye Maharashtra mara la, ka fara Bharatiya Janata parti kan .

O parti in sigira sen kan Balasaheb Thackeray ka hakilina kan min ye Ɛndujamanaba ye ani ka mɔgɔ minnu tɛ mɔgɔ fitininw ye, olu dusu saalo. A bɛ boliw kɛ Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj ye.

title: Interlingua
text:
Interlingua ye diɲɛ kan dɛmɛnan ye min labɛnna san 1937 ni 1951 cɛ Ameriki "International Auxiliary Language Association" (IALA) fɛ. A bɛ diɲɛ dɛmɛnanw cɛma minnu bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ ani a ye diɲɛ dɛmɛkan ye min bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ naturalistic.

Sababou 

Kan

title: Jolly Roger
text:
Pirate ni corsair darapow ye darapow ye minnu bɛ kɛ nin laban ninnu fɛ walasa k’u ka ŋaniyaw jira ani ka kurunw lasiran minnu bɛ binkanni senfɛ. U tɛ yen tuma dɔw la, u kulɛriw bɛ ɲɔgɔn ta (a ka ca a la u ye nɛrɛ walima bilen ye) wa u jiracogo tɛ kelen ye kosɛbɛ.

Miirili min bɛ kɛ mɔgɔw fɛ ani laadala ja la, jagokɛlaw ni kɔrzari darapow ye darapo nɛrɛmaw ye minnu masirilen don ni kungolo ye min bɛ senkɔniw fila kan walima saber fila minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn cɛ. O paviliyɔn tun bɛna taamasiyɛnw jira minnu sugandira jagokɛlaw ni kɔrw fɛ walasa ka cikan dɔ lase min tɛ sigasiga. Kumasen "Jolly Roger" tun bɛna fɔ a siɲɛ fɔlɔ la san 1700; sɛbɛn fɔlɔ min sɛbɛnna, o bɛna kɛ Oxford Angilɛkan daɲɛgafe ta ye min bɔra san 17241.

Tiɲɛ na, nin paviliyɔn in min kunkolo ni senkɔniw tigɛlen don, o ye barokun dɔ ta min lakodɔnnen don kabini kɔrɔlen, n’o tɔgɔ ye ko Memento mori ani min kɔrɔ ye, a kɔrɔ yɛrɛ la ko: “An k’an hakili to a la ko an bɛna sa! ". ". ". Jagokɛlaw ni bukantigiw fɛ, nin saya hakilina in tun ye, a bɛ kɛ cogo min na, ɲɛnamaya bonya ye, wa a tun tɛ saya bolibato ye: ikomi an bɛna sa, an ka teliya ka ɲɛnamaya kɛ, ka tɛmɛ o bɛɛ kan, ka ɲɛnamaya kɛ ka ɲɛ ! Bi, jagokɛlaw ka darapow walima "jolly roger" bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ hali bi.

O siratigɛ la, jagokɛla Bartholomew Roberts y’a ka hakilinata kuncɛ nin cogo la: “I bɛ mun sɔrɔ baara lakika la? Rations fitininw, sara dɔgɔmanw ani baara gɛlɛnw. Anw fɛ, a cayalenba don fo kɔngɔ, diya ni nɔgɔya, hɔrɔnya ni fanga; cogo min na i bɛ wuli ni i ye jate kɛ, k’a sɔrɔ i bɛ farati min na a jugumanba la, o ye ɲɛda dusukasilen ye i bɛ min kɛ juru laban na. Ɲɛnamaya surun nka ɲɛnamaya ɲuman bɛna kɛ ne ka kumasen ye. »

title: Fan Bingbing
text:
Fan Bingbing (Sinakan: 范冰冰, a bangera Sɛtanburukalo tile 16 san 1981) ye Sinuwa dɔnkilidala ye. Kà Bɔ 2013 sàn na ka Nà Se 2017 sàn ma, a Dònna mɔgɔba min sara ka ca Forbes China tɔgɔla 100 lisi kan a kɛlen kɔ ka Kɛ 10 fɔlɔw la sàn o sàn kabini 2006. A tùn bɛ Time gafe ka lisi kan min ye mɔgɔ 100 ye minnu ye fanga Sɔrɔ kosɛbɛ 2017 sàn.

Fan ka baara fɔlɔ kɛra Azi kɔrɔnyanfan sinema ni telewisɔn na, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la a bɔra dramuw la minnu tɔgɔ ye ko My Fair Princess (1998–1999). A ka 'sènbɔli Nàna ni filimu ye min tɔgɔ ye ko Cell Phone (2003) min Kɛra Siniwa jamana ka filimu ye min ye wari Sɔrɔ kosɛbɛ sàn in na. A taara ɲɛ ka kɛ Sinuwa filimu caman na, minnu ye Lost in Beijing (2007), Buddha Mountain (2011) ani Double Xposure (2012) ye. Ka da a kan a kɛra filimu ɲɛmɔgɔ ye min tɔgɔ ye ko I Am Not Madame Bovary (2016), Fan ye laadalata sɔrɔ ka bɔ Golden Horse Film Festival la, Tokyo International Film Festival la, San Sebastián International Film Festival la ani Golden Rooster Awards la. A ka jamana wɛrɛw ka filimu jɔyɔrɔw ye Faransi filimu ye min tɔgɔ ye ko Stretch (2011), Kore jamana ka filimu My Way (2011), Ameriki ka jagokɛla ŋanaw ka filimu X-Men: Days of Future Past (2014) ani Hong Kong-Chinese-American film Skiptrace (2015) .

title: Glosa
text:
Glosa ye dugukolo kan dɛmɛnan jɔlen ye min sinsinnen bɛ Interglossa kan (dɛmɛnkan dɔ sɛbɛn tɛmɛnen dɔ bɔra san 1943). Glosa daɲɛgafe fɔlɔ bɔra san 1978. Kan tɔgɔ bɔra gɛrɛkikan na glossa kɔrɔ ye kan walima kan.

Glosa ye kan danfaralen ye, o kɔrɔ ye ko daɲɛw cogoya tɛ Changé abada, wa Glosa sɛbɛnni fana bɛ kɛ cogo basigilen na pewu ani fɔcogo la. I n’a fɔ kan min bɛ mɔgɔ Bɔ ɲɔgɔn na, inflectionw tɛ yen, o la daɲɛw bɛ To u daɲɛgafe cogo la tuma bɛɛ, baara mana Kɛ cogo o cogo kumasen na. O de kosɔn, daɲɛgafe baarakɛcogo, n’u ma jɛya ka bɔ u kɔnɔkow la, u bɛ ta baarakɛla daɲɛ damadɔ fɛ ani daɲɛw sigicogo baara fɛ (daɲɛgafe). Komin a ye a posteriori kan ye, Glosa b’a ka daɲɛgafe fanba ta Gɛrɛkikan ani Latinkan jujɔ la, sɛbɛnnikɛlaw y’a ye ko u ye diɲɛ jamanaw ye cogo dɔ la u baaracogo fɛ dɔnniya la.

Kan

title: Honshu
text: Honshu ye Japan gunba ye, gun jamana. A bɛ kɔrɔnfɛla jan ani Azi kɔrɔnyanfan kɔgɔjida la, a janya ye mɛtɛrɛ 3776 ye, a bonya ye kilomɛtɛrɛ 227942,85 ye. Duniya gunw cɛma, a ye gun wolonwulanan ye Sumatra kɔfɛ Indonezi kɔnɔ, ani a ye filanan ye Java kɔfɛ jamanaden hakɛ ta fan fɛ. A fana bɛ Japan ka PIB 80% ni kɔ Bɔ ani a ye diɲɛ gunba ye sɔrɔko siratigɛ la, a ye Grande Bretagne (UK) Kὲlɛ jɔyɔrɔ flanan na.

title: Yoga
text:
Yoga (Sanskrikan na devanāgarī: योग; “jɛɲɔgɔnya, jɔrɔnanko, fɛɛrɛ1”, “lafiɲɛ2”) ye Ɛnduw ka āstika hakilila ka lakɔliso wɔɔrɔ dɔ ye min ka laɲini ye hɔrɔnya ye (moksha). O ye kololi walima wale ye min bɛ kɛ waati ni waati caman na, min laɲini ye, hakilijakabɔ, asceticisme ani farikolo degeliw fɛ, ka hadamaden ka kelenya sɔrɔ a farikolo, hakili ani hakili ta fan fɛ4.

Yoga laada siraba naani (mārga) ye jnana yoga, bhakti yoga, karma yoga ani raja yoga ye. U ɲɛfɔlen don sɛbɛnw kɔnɔ i n’a fɔ Bhagavad-Gita. A bɛ san kɛmɛ 2nan ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ Krisita tile ɲɛ. J.-C. ani san kɛmɛ 5nan min bɛ yoga hakilila kofɔ Yoga-sûtra kɔnɔ, sɛbɛn min bɛ tali kɛ Patañjali la, ani miiriya minnu bɛ yen, olu bɛɛ lajɛlen

Yoga daɲɛ bɛ fɔ bi, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la Tlebi jamanaw na, walasa ka jɔcogo yoga suguya dɔw jira (in) minnu bɛ bɔ hatha yoga la ka caya walima ka dɔgɔ, ani bi danfɛnw6. Nka hatha yoga, min ka sɛbɛn kɔrɔ dɔ, min sɛbɛnna san kɛmɛ tan ni duurunan na, o ye Haṭha Yoga Pradīpikā ye, o ye yoga bolofara dɔrɔn de ye.

San 2014, ONU ye zuwɛnkalo tile 21 jate « Duniya Yoga don » ye, Ɛndujamana fasodenɲumanya minisiriɲɛmɔgɔ Narendra Modi7 ka ɲɛmɔgɔya kɔrɔ.

O wale ninnu ye kɔrɔfɔ suguya caman ye, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, u ɲɛsinnen bɛ u ka jagokɛcogo ma Tlebi diɲɛ kɔnɔ ani farati min bɛ se ka kɛ jɛkuluw ka bɔli ye.

A bɔyɔrɔ ni a bɔcogo 
Yoga daɲɛ bɛ sɔrɔ Rig-Veda kɔnɔ, min dabɔcogo bɛ daminɛ san kɛmɛ 15nan ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ Krisita tile ɲɛ. J.-C. ani san kɛmɛ tannan na Krisita tile ɲɛ. Nka, a tɛ kɛ hakili ta fan fɛ kololi kɔrɔ la, nka a bɛ kɛ kɔrɔ wɛrɛw la, i n’a fɔ wotoro, a ɲɔgɔnnaw, hali ni dɔw, i n’a fɔ Tara Michaël, bɛ o daɲɛw kɔrɔ fɔ kokura o kɔrɔ la8. A kofɔlen bɛ Upanishad laban dɔw dɔrɔn de la, i n’a fɔ Shvetashvatara-upanishad9. A bɛ san kɛmɛ 2nan ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ Krisita tile ɲɛ. J.-C.

Daɲɛgafe siratigɛ la, daɲɛ "yoga" (devānagarī: योग) ye, sanskrikan na, cɛ tɔgɔ ye min jɔlen don ni barokun kanhakɛ -a 10 farali ye YUJ- ju la wale tɔgɔ min bɛ cɛya la caman na, o barokun. Ni a Taara degere guṇa la, YUJ- ju bɛ Kɛ YOJ- ye. Sanskrikan fɔcogo sariyaw b’a ɲini ka fɔ, ko dɔw la, palatal mankan j- kan guttural mankan g-11 fɔcogo yɔrɔ la.

O la, YUJ- radikali bɛ kɛ YOG- ye. O radikali in bɔra Ɛndu-Erɔpu daɲɛ *yugóm la, a yɛrɛ bɔra *yeug- ju la. Indo-Erɔpukan na i n’a fɔ denmusokan fanba la, nin daɲɛ in y’a kɔrɔ fɔlɔ mara min ye jɔli ye (misali la: yukan hitikan na, iugum latigɛkan na, یوغ Pɛrɛsikan na, a ɲɔgɔnnaw)12. YOG- o kɔfɛ, a bɛ sira Di bɔli fɔlɔ suguya wɛrɛw ma, o la, barokun tɔgɔlama yoga- ta fana bɛ yen.

Nka, Paninekaw ka daɲɛ jujɔw lajɛlen na, n’o ye dhatu-patha ye, ju wɛrɛ YUJ bɛ Di, o kɔrɔ ye ko "lafiɲɛ" (samadhi), o de bɛ To ɲɛfɔlikɛla Vyasa2 fɛ. I n’a fɔ Yoga-sutra ɲɛfɔli b’a sinsin cogo min na: “yoga ye hakili ka lamaga-lamagaliw jɔli ye (ka lafiɲɛ)”13.

Kɔrɔɲɔgɔnmaya 
Sanskrikan daɲɛ YUJ- kɔrɔ ye “ka fɛnw minɛ, ka ɲɔgɔn fara ɲɔgɔn kan1” walima hali “ka lafiɲɛ, ka jɔ2”. Daɲɛ “yoga” kɔrɔ ninnu cɛma (kɔrɔɲɔgɔnmaya-yɔrɔ ka bon kosɛbɛ) sanskrikan na: “1) wale min bɛ kɛ ka fɛnw minɛ; 2) sow degecogo; 3) baarakɛcogo cikanw, fɛɛrɛ; 4) kololi alako ta fan fɛ; 5) raja-yoga (raja-yoga) ; 6) hatha yoga (hatha yoga) ; 7) jɛ-ka-baara walima kelenya cogoya min bɛ danfɛn subjectif ni sanfɛla la (ka kɛɲɛ ni Shrî Aurobindo ka fɔta ye)”14.

Shankara ka vedanta ka fanga kɔrɔ (dɔw cɛma), o ju in bɛna kɔrɔfɔ kokura "jɛɲɔgɔnya" kɔrɔ la atman ni brahman cɛ, k'a sɔrɔ Yoga-sutra fila-fila waati la, a bɛ bɛnbaliya kɔkɔrɔ, hakili ta fan fɛ monad (purusha) ka kan k'a yɛrɛ hɔrɔnya ka bɔ diɲɛ na k'a jɛya2.

O la, "yoga" daɲɛ kɔrɔ ka bon kosɛbɛ Ɛndujamana na, wa a tɛ dan farikoloɲɛnajɛ walima hali hakilijakabɔ kɛcogo ma: ka kɛɲɛ ni kunnafonidilaw Mari Kock ka fɔ la, min ye sɛgɛsɛgɛli dɔ kɛ yoga tariku kan, "Siga t'a la, ko kɛlenw kɛra daɲɛ “yoga” min bɛ san ba caman sɛbɛnw kɔnɔ. Nka a kɔrɔ tun tɛ kelen ye fewu, a bɛ kɛlɛ kɛcogo dɔ jira yan, sow siricogo dɔ jira yen, yɔrɔ wɛrɛw la wale sugu dɔ.

Yogakɛla ye mun ye? 

Naga Sadhus (Sadhu farilankolon) bɛ Ɛndujamana na san 2013

Ɛnduw ka jate la, yogi (Sanskrikan na IAST: yogī) walima yogi (musoman na, yogini) ye ascetic ye min bɛ yoga kɛ min bɛ se ka kɛ samnyâsin ye, sādhu walima guru. O kumasen tɛ baara dɔ jira, nka a bɛ cɛsiri sugu dɔ jira alako ta fan fɛ; a bɛ kɛ fana Budadiinɛ na16 walasa ka mɔgɔ jira min b’a yɛrɛ di hakili degeli ma17.

Tariku

Barokunba: Yoga tariku. 
Bhairava, Shiva a ka cogo sirannin na.

San 1920 waatiw la, fɛnkɔrɔw ɲininikɛlaw ka kulu dɔ min ɲɛmɔgɔya tun bɛ John Marshall bolo, olu ye tiɲɛniw sɔrɔ Indus (bi Pakistan) baji da la, Mohenjo-Daro dugu kɔnɔ, o dugu tun bɛna sigi senkan san ba saba ka kɔn an ka waati ɲɛ. Fɛn minnu nana kɛnɛ kan o sɛgɛsɛgɛliw senfɛ, taamasiyɛn minnu ja jiralen don ni ja ye min sigilen bɛ senw tigɛlen na min b’a jira ko hatha-yoga jɔcogo (asana) bɛ yen, olu ye sɔsɔli lawuli, k’a sɔrɔ dannaya dɔɔnin ma kɛ o ko in kan., a bɛ se ka kɛ ko yoga tun bɛ waati janba dɔ la ka kɔn kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛn min tun dalen bɛ a la, Indus-Sarasvati siwili kɔnɔ18.

Ka kɛɲɛ ni Aryanw ka binkanni ka tesis ye, san kɛmɛ tan ni wolonwulanan lamini na Krisita tile ɲɛ. J.-C., Aryanw tun bɛna don Panjab19 kɔnɔ, ka na n’u ka siwili ye min kofɔlen don Vedas kɔnɔ, Ɛndu diinɛ ju min na yoga bɛna nɔrɔ min na. U b’u yɛrɛ su Ɛndujamana woroduguyanfan jamanadenw ka laadalakow la, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la yoga kɛcogo, dɔw ka fɔ la, o tun bɛna kɛ fɔlɔ Indukaw cɛma20. Sisan fɛnkɔrɔw dɔnbagaw ni tariku dɔnbagaw b’a jate ko Sarasvati jalen, k’a sababu kɛ waati cogoya ye, o ye Indus siwili jamanadenw wajibiya ka taa kɔrɔn fɛ.

O waati laadalakow kama, “Formula fɔli ka ca ni kumakan-mago sugu dɔ daminɛni ye, sanni ka tiɲɛ dafalen sugu dɔ fɔ21”. O lafilili min bɛ mɔgɔ janto kosɛbɛ, o bɛ Sɔrɔ mantra-yoga la, wa jateminɛ min bɛ Kɛ taamaʃyɛn na, o bɛ Sɔrɔ bolow jɔyɔrɔw la minnu bɛ mudrâ, minnu bɛ kodɔn ani minnu ye taamaʃyɛn ye. Nka, Ɛndu dɔnnikɛla fanba b’a jate ko Veda bɛ bɔ san kɛmɛ tan ni duurunan na Krisita tile ɲɛ. J.-C.

San kɛmɛ wolonwulanan lamini na Krisita tile ɲɛ. J.-C., Upaniṣad ye Vɛda jirali sɛbɛn kulu sabanan ni laban ye. Yan, metafiziki dusudon bɛ liturji ka sɛrɛkili dantigɛlen tigɛ, ka bɔ bɛnkanw na ka taa bɛnkanw na, a bɛ wuli ka taa tiɲɛ sanfɛla la22: ni kelen-kelen (ātman) ni diɲɛ ni (brahman) danfara 19, barokun min bɛna ta san ba kelen o kɔfɛ, yoga kɔrɔ Vɛdantiki la.

San kɛmɛda 4nan lamini na Krisita tile ɲɛ. J.-C. Yoga Sūtra (Y.S.)23 ani Bhagavad-Gītā sɛbɛnna, u bɛna kɛ yoga ka ɲɛfɔli sɛbɛnw ye.

yoga ka sutra 

O suite min ye aphorisme 195 ye, o codifié san kɛmɛ 2nan lamini na Krisita tile ɲɛ. AD min kɛra Patañjali fɛ. A bɛ kuma hadamaden kɔnɔna na ani fɛɛrɛw kan minnu bɛ se ka waleya walasa k’i yɛrɛ hɔrɔnya ka bɔ nescience (अविद्या avidyā) la, ka tɔɔrɔ lase mɔgɔ ma. Yoga Sūtra24 bɛ yoga kɛcogo kofɔ sapitiri naani kɔnɔ:

Sapitiri fɔlɔ, Kelenya kan25: Samādhi pāda.

Sutra fɔlɔ min tɔgɔ ye ko “Wa sisan, yoga kalanni filɛ nin ye”26, o kɔrɔ fɔra ɲɛfɔlikɛlaw fɛ ko a bɛ tali kɛ matigi-kalandenw ka cakɛda la min bɛ mɔgɔw lase mɔgɔw ma. nin tilayɔrɔba in bɛ yoga kuntilenna ɲɛfɔ o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ27 min tɛ kɛ ni kabako tɛ tubabukan mɔgɔw la minnu delila ka âsana (jɔyɔrɔ) kɛcogo dɔrɔn dɔn: Patañjali fɛ, o ye hakilijagabɔ dabila ye28 min bɛ ego min tara Yɛrɛ kama29, o ka tɔɔrɔ ni o ɲagami lawuli. O kɔfɛ, a bɛ gɛlɛyaw n’u kunbɛncogo jira: a laban na, a bɛ misali dɔ jira, ka samadhi taabolo danfaralenw ɲɛfɔ.

Sura II, Taama kan: Sādhana pāda.

Nin tilayɔrɔba in bɛ tɔɔrɔ sababuw bɔ kɛnɛ kan ani ka danfara jira iko bɔyɔrɔ. Walasa ka danfara yiriwa, Ashtanga yoga sira 8 labatoli waati kelen na, o bɛ kɛ yoga kɛcogo jusigilanw ye.

Sura II, Taama kan: Sādhana pāda.

Nin tilayɔrɔba in bɛ tɔɔrɔ sababuw bɔ kɛnɛ kan ani ka danfara jira iko bɔyɔrɔ. Walasa ka danfara yiriwa, Ashtanga yoga sira 8 labatoli waati kelen na, o bɛ kɛ yoga kɛcogo jusigilanw ye.

1- yama : ka jogoɲumanya baara fɔlɔw kɛ mɔgɔ wɛrɛw la ka fara i yɛrɛ kan.

2- niyama : ka kololi ani ka i yɛrɛ suman don o don walew la.

3- āsana : ka jɔ cogo sabatilen na; Patañjali tɛ kuma waati si la jɔyɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ kan, a sigilen tɛ, a jɔlen tɛ.

4- Prāṇāyāma: ka kɛ ninakili dɔnni ye; Patañjali tɛ Prāṇāyāma si ɲɛfɔ ka ɲɛ, wa a tɛ kuma ninakili kunbɛnni kan abada.

5- pratyāhāra : dusukunnataw faamuyali ni fɛn faamuyalen faranfasicogo dɔnni.

O anga (yɔrɔ) duuru ninnu de ye hatha-yoga jɔnjɔnw ye.

Sapitiri sabanan, Fanga: Vibhūti pāda.

A saba labanw ɲɛfɔli:

6- dhāraṇā : ka i hakili to i hakili la, ka i sinsin yɔrɔ kelen kan.

7- dhyāna : hakilijakabɔ jugu, ka dusukunnataw doncogo bɛɛ labɛn fɛn faamuyalen dusukun na (aw ye hakilijakabɔ lajɛ).

8- samādhi: hakilijakabɔ jugu, fɛnw ni ko kɛlenw faamuyali minnu tɛ mɔgɔ yɛrɛ ka projesiyɔn si kɔfɛ.

O kɔfɛ, nin tilayɔrɔba in bɛ fanga kabakomaw sɔrɔli lawuli (siddhi), ka lasɔmi ko o fanga ɲinini bɛ se ka kɛ bali ye.

Sapitiri IV, Hɔrɔnya kan: Kaivalya pāda.

Karma ni fila-fila jirali, o kɔfɛ ka bɔ fila-fila la ka taa kelenya la. O ye barokunw bɛɛ daminɛni jugu ye minnu bɔra kɛnɛ kan kaban ka ɲɛsin danfara laban ma min bɛ taa ni hɔrɔnya ye.

Bhagavad-Gita ye baara kɛ 

Filozofi labɛn bɛ dafa Bhagavad-Gītā fɛ, o ye sɛbɛn nafama ye Ɛndu diinɛ miirili la30, min bɛ yoga siraw danfaralenw n’u ka filozofiw ɲɛfɔ. N’a sɔrɔla a sɛbɛnna san kɛmɛ 5nan ni san kɛmɛ 2nan cɛ Krisita tile ɲɛ. J.-C.31, sɛbɛn in “tɛ kelen ye, a bɛ nɔ suguya caman janfa30”. Bhagavad-Gītā bɛ Fɔ ka Kɛ sapitiri fitinin tan ni seegin ye, k'a yɛrɛ Kɛ Mahābhārata sapitiri dɔ ye. Sapitiri 2nan tɛmɛsira 48nan (Yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi “min sigira sen kan yoga la, i bɛ se ka wale kɛ”) ye yoga kɛcogo kɔrɔfɔcogo jɔnjɔn ye.

Ɛndiyɛn dɔnbaga Anne-Marie Esnoul ka fɔ la: “Sɛbɛn bɛɛ kɔnɔko minnu bɛ mɔgɔ kabakoya kosɛbɛ, olu dɔ ye nafa ye min dira yoga ma, n’a bɛ tali kɛ kololi kelen-kelen kɔrɔ la: dusukunnataw ka kelenya, o kɔfɛ, miirili. Yan, yoga bɛ bɔnɛ a ka fɛɛrɛ kɔrɔ caman na walasa ka kɛ bhakti kɔrɔɲɔgɔnma ye. [...] Nin bato in min dilannen don ni hakilijagabɔ ye, min ɲɛsinnen bɛ kuntilenna kelen ma, o bɛna labɛn barokun damadɔw lamini na: sâmkhya dɔ ka miiriyaw min ma fɔlɔ ka fɛɛrɛ sigilen ta, an bɛna min ye san kɛmɛ nataw la, teoriw wale min bɛ kɛ “saraka” kɔrɔ la ani “wale ɲumanw30. »

Bi waati 
San kɛmɛ 19nan cɛmancɛ la, tubabukan dɔnnikɛla dɔw ka baara kɛlenw faransikan na, olu y’a daminɛ ka baara kɛ ni yoga daɲɛ ye32,33.

San 1851, dɔgɔtɔrɔ N. C. Paul (en) ye Treatise on Yoga Philosophy34 bɔ tubabukan na, k’a kɛ a ɲinini ye ka dɔnniya taabolo dɔ kɛ o ko la35 (a lajɛ science of yoga (en)).

San 1893, yoga kɛra lakodɔnnenba ye kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la Ameriki jamana na diinɛw ka pariti ka kɛ sababu ye ka diɲɛ jirali kɛ Chicago, a siɲɛ fɔlɔ don Tlebi jamanaw ye "Endu mɔnikɛ" sɔrɔ, Vivekananda, Râmakrishna ka kalanden, min tun ye o dɔ ye san kɛmɛ tan ni kɔnɔntɔnnan Ɛndujamana hakili ta fan fɛ karamɔgɔbaw. A bɛna mɔgɔw bila ka miiri kosɛbɛ, wa a bɛna jɔli kɛ. San 1896, a ye gafe bɔ min tɔgɔ ye ko Raja Yoga (en), a ka Patañjali ka Yoga sūtra faamuyali bɛrɛbɛnna Tlebi jamanaw ma, o kɛra ɲɛtaa ye o yɔrɔnin bɛɛ, wa a bɛ se ka jate, ka kɛɲɛ ni Elizabeth De Michelis ka fɔ ye, ko bi yoga bɔyɔrɔ (en)

San kɛmɛ 20nan na, yoga i n’a fɔ a bɛ dɔn cogo min na bi Tlebi fɛ, o yiriwara ka kɛ jɔcogo yoga suguya caman ye. O cogo la, kunnafonisɛbɛndila Mari Kock ka fɔ la, ka tarikusɛbɛnnaw ka baara kɛ fɛn ye min bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ, yoga « i n’a fɔ an b’a dɔn cogo min na - yoga jɔcogo jɛlen, n’a kalanni bɛ bɔ matigi la ka taa kalanden wɛrɛ la, wa a tɛ bɔ matigi la ka taa kalanden wɛrɛ la -, a tɛ kɛ tugun.» ka tɛmɛ san kɛmɛ kan. [...] Tiɲɛ na, jɔli fangama fɔlɔw bɛ bɔ san kɛmɛ tan ni duurunan dɔrɔn de la. Tle foli ta fan fɛ, jɔcogo ɲɔgɔn kɔ par excellence, a bɔra tiɲɛ na san kɛmɛ tan ni segin dɔrɔn de la. »

San 1924, Sri Tirumalai Krishnamacharia ye yoga kalanso dɔ sigi senkan min ye hatha-yoga misali ta i n’a fɔ a bɛ dɔn cogo min na Tlebi fɛ ani ka doncogo kɔsegin o wale in na k’a jira iko fɛɛrɛ min bɛ se ka hakili ta fan fɛ dusukunnataw sɔrɔ minnu, fɔlɔ , tun bɛ miiri ko a wajibiyalen don ka kɔn o ɲɛ38. Krishnamacharia ye lakɔli dɔ da wuli Mysore san 1924, tubabu farikoloɲɛnajɛ ladamu ni Suwɛdi farikoloɲɛnajɛw ye nɔ bila a la: a laɲini tun ye ka Ɛnduw ka “farikolo seko” dɔ da min bɛ se ka ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ ni fɛn ye min tun bɛ Tlebi jamanaw na o waati la B. K. S. Iyengar, a ka kalanden dɔ, bɛna a yɛrɛ ka cogoya da, n’o ye Yoga Iyengar ye, wa a bɛna gafe bɔ san 1966, n’o ye Light on Yoga (en) ye min bɛna nɔba bila yoga jɔcogo jɛnsɛnni na Kalanden wɛrɛ, Pattabhi Jois, bɛna farikolo ni fanga Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga cogoya yiriwa min bɛna kɛ kosɛbɛ Tlebi jamanaw na40.

San 1924, master wɛrɛ, Paramahansa Yogananda, taara Los Angeles, a ye kalan kɛ Ameriki dugu caman na kabini a sera Boston san 192041. A ye jɛkulu sigi senkan Self-Realization Fellowship (in). A bɛ kalan min lase, kriya yoga, ani yogakɛla tɔw ta, o bɛna nɔba bila hippie tɔnba in na san 1960 waatiw la15.O kɔfɛ, yoga kɛra Ameriki ye, wa filozofi hakilina min ye “kisi” ye, o bilala a nɔ na minnu ka ca ni “kɛnɛya” ni “ɲɛnamaya” ye15. Yogananda ka Autobiography of a Yogi bɛna kɛ kɛlɛ kɔfɛ gafe ye min bɛ feere kosɛbɛ, min bɛna nɔ bila George Harrison na kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la, ani ka Beatles ka sigili latigɛ Ɛndujamana na san 1968 u ka hippie waati la42, o bɛna kɛ sababu ye ka ɲininkali kɛ yogi ka Ɛndujamana na Tlebi fan bɛɛ la. O ɲɛtaa kura in bɛna kɛ ni jɛgɛw ye minnu bɛ yoga kɛcogo lamini : guru minnu tɛ laadala kalan lakika si sɔrɔ, dɔnniya nkalonma ni waati kura kuma, wale minnu bɛ yɔrɔ jan ka taa a fɛ Ɛnduw ka gundolakow la walima minnu bɛ kɛ karikatɛriw ye diinɛkulu walima cɛnimusoya jiginni hukumu kɔnɔ, jagofɛnw kɛli, turisimu jamana

Tariku dɔnbaga Meera Nanda ka fɔ la, “bi yoga ye misali kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen ye min bɛ diɲɛ danfɛn lakika jira, min kɔnɔ, kɔrɔnfɛla ni tilebinfɛla walew farala ɲɔgɔn kan walasa ka kalan dɔ lase min bonyalen don diɲɛ fan bɛɛ la. Ɛndu diinɛ, kɔrɔlen, cɛmancɛla waati walima bi, jo kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen tɛ a la ka kɛ tigi ye san kɛmɛ 21nan na jɔcogo yoga kan. Ni an y’a fɔ cogo wɛrɛ la, o bɛna kɛ filiba ye. Dɔ wɛrɛw dalen b’a la ko yoga i n’a fɔ a bɛ kɛ cogo min na kosɛbɛ jamana dɔw la, o kɛra Tlebi farikolo kɛcogo caman ye i n’a fɔ kalistɛni walima san kɛmɛ 19nan laban farikoloɲɛnajɛ, min bɛ datugu sanfɛ ni kɔrɔnfɛ gundo dɔ ye min tɛmɛna san caman kɔnɔ germanic lebensreform filter

San 2014 desanburukalo la, Duniya Kelenyatɔnba ka lajɛba ye sariyasunba dɔ ta ni wote 177 ye min daminɛna Ɛndujamana minisiriɲɛmɔgɔ Narendra Modi fɛ (ka tugu Sri Sri Ravi Shankar ka hakilinata kɔ)45, min ye jamanadenw wele u ka dɛmɛ don “dugukolo kan yoga don” hakilina ma, on Zuwɛnkalo tile 21, walasa ka “yoga kɛcogo nafaw yiriwa”. Kunnafonidila Mari Kock ka fɔ la, nin wale in b’a to Ɛndu fanga, fasodenɲumanya siratigɛ la, ka se ka wale dɔ sɔrɔ kokura min bɛ diɲɛ kɔnɔ sisan, nka sanko o bɛɛ, a kɛtɔ ka wale dɔ yiriwa min bɛ fɔ ko a hakili tɛ to a la, walasa ka « Ɛndujamana ka Ɛnduw ka yɔrɔ bonya Kalo tɛmɛnen na, Modi ye Yoga minisiriso dɔ sigi senkan Ɛndujamana kɔnɔ (min ka danbe bɛ taa Ɛnduw ka laadala furaw fana na: Ayurveda, Unani ani Siddha, omɛopati ni naturopathi fana bɛ o la - Erɔpu kalan fila minnu bɛ kɛ cogoya la, minnu dabɔra kɔsa in na) Modi ka yoga seginni in in bɛ jalaki kɛlɛcɛw fɛ minnu b’a ye ko politiki baara bɛ kɛ ni propagande ye48.

Filɛsofi ka fɛɛrɛ 
Yoga ye Ɛnduw ka āstika hakilila (minnu bɛ veda fanga dɔn) ka hakilina wɔɔrɔ (darśana) dɔ ye. U bɛ baara Kɛ fla-fla: nyāya ni vaiśeṣika, sāṃkhya ni yoga, mīmāṃsā ani vedānta. O darśana ninnu jatera ko nafamaw ye walasa ka tiɲɛ yecogo dafalen sɔrɔ. Tiɲɛ na, nin dɔnniya sira wɔɔrɔ ninnu sigili ɲɔgɔn kan, o de bɛna a to an bɛ se ka a bɛɛ minɛ « n’an bɛ ja dɔ lajɛ ka bɔ yɔrɔw la minnu tɛ kelen ye sanni an ka se ka hakilina bɛɛ lajɛlen dɔ sigi a kan »51.

Ka bɔ Sāṃkhya52 la, n’o ye fila-fila ni Ala dɔnbali sigicogo ye, yoga bɛ juru ta hakilinata-fɛn caman na i n’a fɔ: Puruṣa53, Prakṛti ani guṇa54.

« Min tora dɔnbaliya siratigɛ la, o ye gɛlɛya duuru55 ka bɔnɛ ye minnu ye dɔnbaliya, ego, nɔrɔli fɛn caman na i n’a fɔ a yɛrɛ ka hakilinaw, a yɛrɛ gɛnni ani saya siran56.

Fasiriw bɛ Kɛ Tlebi fɛ 
Yoga laɲini ka kɛɲɛ ni tubabukan miiriya ye, o ye bɛnkan ɲinini ye, farikolo ni hakili ka kelenya. Patañjali fɛ, o fana ye hakili caman caman cili dabila ye (citta), minnu ye karma sɔrɔyɔrɔw ye. O cogoya in ye sisan waati dɔ ye, wa a bɛ se ka sɔrɔ hadamaden bɛɛ fɛ. “Yoga dusukun na, cikan nafama dɔ bɛ yen : hadamaden bɛɛ bɛ balan a yɛrɛ la ani a dafalen don bawo Yɛrɛ 57 tɛ se ka tiɲɛ walima ka tiɲɛ. Nin ye an ka danbe ye, wa yoga ye sira ye min b se ka nin kɔnɔnafɛn in dɔn kosɛbɛ, n’o ye Yɛrɛ ye."58 o b’a to an bɛ se ka wale kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni an magow ye, an ka ŋaniyaw ani nafaw ye minnu ka di an ye kosɛbɛ.Kɛnɛma , a b’an kalan k’an farikolo barika bonya, k’an farikolo lafiya ani k’an balan ani ka hɛrɛ ni hakilijagabɔ sɔrɔ fɛn dɔ kan.A laban na, a fɔra ko yoga bɛ na ni an ka cogoya lakika dɔnni ye tigitigi.

Yoga ye hakilitigiya ye min tɛ danfara bɔ: dannaya bɛɛ, hali diinɛko walima hadamadenya ta fan fɛ, bɛ se k’u jate sɔrɔ yen. Nka, yoga tɛ diinɛ ye. Yoga bɛ jɛɲɔgɔnya, diinɛ sugandili60 walima u kana61 to bonya la. Min nafa ka bon, o ye hakiliɲagami dabila ye: mɔgɔ wɛrɛw bonya, hɛrɛ ni fariyabaliya (walima Ahimsa).

Jean Varenne, Faransi Indologist, y’a sɛbɛn san 1971 a ka yoga Upanishadw daminɛ na, ko “Yoga min kɛra kɔsa in na Tlebi fɛ” bɛ ɲinɛ a ka metafiziki ni filozofi jusigilanw kɔ walasa k’a farikolo fanw dɔrɔn mara : 

“An ye yɔrɔw dɔrɔn de mara minnu bɛ wele ko “walekɛcogo” (farikolo farikoloɲɛnajɛ, ninakili sumaya) [...] walasa ka “to cogo la”. An k’an hakili To a la fana ko nin taamaʃyɛnw (sigi senw tigɛli, ninakili dɔɔnin dɔɔnin) tɛ fosi ye Yoga lakika siratigɛ la n’a ma kɔn u ɲɛ ni kololiw (yama ni niyama) labatoli gɛlɛn ye ani n’u ma yamaruya ka ɲinini kɛ kaivalya cogoya min bɛ sɔrɔ dusukunnataw bɔli fɛ ani miirili tiɲɛni fɛ. Nka sanko o bɛɛ la Yoga tɛ foyi ye n’a ma ye diɲɛ hakilina dɔ bɛɛ lajɛlen na (darshana) min tɛ se ka tigɛtigɛ ka “labɛn”. A ka fisa k’a kalan a yɛrɛ ye ani ka se ka sɛbɛnw sɔrɔ tigitigi. »

— Jean Varenne, Yoga Upanishadw62. Bamako, Mali.

Kuma bɛɛ la, yoga i n’a fɔ a miirila cogo min na ani a kɛra cogo min na Tlebi fɛ kabini san kɛmɛ 20nan na, a ni Ɛnduw ka laadalakow bɛ tali kɛ ɲɔgɔn na cogo min na15 (aw ye yɔrɔ “Bi waati” lajɛ sanfɛ).

Degeli 
Yoga siraw ni cogoya caman bɛ yen minnu bɛ tali kɛ mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ka laɲiniw danfaralenw na ani an ka cogoya fan suguya caman na. Laadalata siraba naani bɛ o siraw Lajɛ.

Sira kelen kɔnɔ (मार्ग, mārga), jikuru suguya wɛrɛw bɛ Se ka Kɛ. Yogakɛla min dɔnna ko a ye kalan kɛcogo dɔ dɔn kosɛbɛ, o bɛ se k’a latigɛ ka yoga kalanso dɔ sigi sen kan. O danfara in tɛ barikantanya walima bɛnbaliya taamasyɛn ye, nka a bɛ kɛ bɛɛ ka jigiya suguya camanba jaabi ye.

Yoga tɛ elitist wale ye wa a bɛ ladamu a kɛbaga kelen-kelen bɛɛ la. Ni ɲɔgɔndan hakili ni laɲini si tɛ a la, mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ se k’a yɛrɛ bila o la, a si hakɛ, jamana, diinɛ, banabagatɔ walima kɛnɛya, a ɲɔgɔnnaw.63,64.

O cogo la, 2017 sàn, Faransi tùn bɛ ni baarakɛla miliyɔn 2,5 ɲɔgɔn ye. A jatera musow ka kalan ye kabini tuma jan, wa a bɛ kɛ mɔgɔkɔrɔbaw fɛ kosɛbɛ, yoga bɛ ka kɛ demokarasi ye ka taa a fɛ, wa a bɛ baarakɛla kuraw sama san o san65. O cogo la, an b’a ye ko yoga kalanw cogoya bɛ lamɛnnikɛla kuraw ye i n’a fɔ denmisɛnw walima musokɔnɔmaw.

Laadalata sira naani 
Laadalata siraba naani bɛ Se ka o siraw Lajɛ. A bɛ se ka kɛ ka tugu u kɔ ɲɔgɔn fɛ walima u danma:

jnana yoga, yoga sira min ka laɲini ye ka dɔnniya SIMPKB tɛmɛnen sɔrɔ;

bhakti yoga, o ye bato yoga sira ye;

karma yoga, baara ni yɛrɛdɔnbaliya yoga sira. O yoga saba minnu bɛ sanfɛ, olu bɛ kɛ trimarga ye, walima yeelen sira. Fɛɛrɛ dɔ tun bɛna sɔrɔ min bɛna nin ascetices saba ninnu fara ɲɔgɔn kan kokura kelen na ani min tun bɛna kɛ u ɲɛfɛ. O cogo la, madhyama marga tun bɛna kɛ cɛmancɛ sira sɔrɔyɔrɔ ye, Budadiinɛ ni Zen bɛ bɔ min na ;

rāja yoga, yoga sira min lawulila yoga sutraw fɛ minnu sɛbɛnna Patañjali fɛ, o yoga sira in bɛ taa ɲɛ kosɛbɛ hakilijakabɔ fɛ (dhyana). A bɛ jate fana i n’a fɔ yoga “integral” walima “royal” min bɛ yoga saba tɛmɛnenw fara ɲɔgɔn kan ni Hatha-Yoga ye.

title: Ashoka
text:
Ashoka walima Ashoka the Great (304 K.Ɲ. fo san 232 K.Ɲ.) tun ye Ɛndu masakɛ ye. Ale tun ye Maurya Mansamara masakɛ sabanan ye. A jate bɛ Kɛ Ɛnduw ka tariku faamaba ye fo ka na Se bì ma.

A ka masaya daminɛna san 269 K.Ɲ. ka se san 232 K.Ɲ., Ɛndu kɔrɔlen na. Mansamara Ashoka ka mansamara tun bɛ bi Ɛndujamana, Pakistan, Afganistan, Nepal ani Bangaladeshi jamana fanba la. O Maurya Mansamara belebele in kɛra Ɛndu mansamara belebeleba ye kabini o waati fo ka na se bi ma.

Mansa Ashoka fana lakodɔnnen don a ka maracogo ɲuman fɛ ani Budadiinɛ yiriwali diɲɛ kɔnɔ. Ɛndujamana ka ‘Taamaʃyɛn’ bɔra masakɛ Ashoka ka Pilari la. ‘Ashoka Chakra’ fana ye jɔyɔrɔ sɔrɔ Ɛndujamana jamana darapo la.

title: Subdomain (yɔrɔ fitinin).
text:
Domain Name System (DNS) hierarchy kɔnɔ, subdomain ye domaine ye min ye domaine (kunba) wɛrɛ yɔrɔ dɔ ye. Misali la, ni domani dɔ ye ɛntɛrinɛti feerekɛyɔrɔ dɔ di k’a kɛ u ka siti ye example.com kɔnɔ, a bɛ se ka baara kɛ ni domani fitinin ye min tɔgɔ ye ko shop.example.com .

Kuma bɛɛ lajɛlen 
Domain Name System (DNS) bɛ ni jiribolodacogo walima a sigiyɔrɔma ye, min kɔnɔ node bɛ jiri kan ka kɛ domain tɔgɔ ye. Subdomain ye domaine ye min ye domaine belebeleba dɔ ye. Label kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ se ka kɛ octet 1 fo 63 ye. Domɛni tɔgɔ dafalen tɛ Se ka Tɛmɛ ASCII taamaʃyɛn 253 bɛɛ kan a sɛbɛnni jiracogo la.

Subdomains (yɔrɔ fitininw) bɛ ɲɛfɔ ni DNS zone file (DNS zone file) sɛgɛsɛgɛli ye min ɲɛsinnen bɛ parent domain ma. Nka, sɔsɔli bɛ senna "subdomain" daɲɛ baaracogo kan n'a bɛ tali kɛ tɔgɔw la minnu bɛ karti ka taa Adrɛsi sɛbɛn A (jatigila) la ani zone sɛbɛn suguya wɛrɛw minnu bɛ se ka karti ka taa foroba IP ladɛrɛsi yɔrɔ o yɔrɔ la ani suguya o suguya server (sɛrɛkili). Réseau Operations ekipuw b’a fɔ ko a man ɲi ka baara kɛ ni "subdomain" daɲɛ ye walasa ka karti wɛrɛ jira min tɛ zone NS (tɔgɔsɛbɛn) sɛbɛnw fɛ ani sèrwɛri-yɔrɔ wɛrɛ min tɛ o ye.

RFC 1034 ka fɔ la, "domain ye domaine wɛrɛ ka subdomain ye n'a bɛ o domaine kɔnɔ". Ka da o ɲɛfɔli kan, jatigila tɛ se ka kɛ yɔrɔ fitinin ye, domani dɔrɔn de bɛ se ka kɛ yɔrɔ fitinin ye. Subdomain fana bɛna kɛ ni zone file danfaralen ye ni SOA sɛbɛn ye (Start of Authority).

Domani sɛbɛn fanba bɛ domani tɔgɔ dɔrɔn de Di min bɛ dakun fla-fla. A ka c’a la, jatigila baarakɛlaw bɛ DNS Serverw di walasa ka yɔrɔ fitininw ɲɛnabɔ o master domain kɔnɔ.

Domani tɔgɔ min bɛ se ka dafa, o bɛ kɛ yɔrɔ caman ye. Misali la, aw bɛ tubabukan Wikipeja domɛni ta en.wikipedia.org. En ye wikipedia.org ka yɔrɔ fitinin dɔ ye. Hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ a ka c’a la, wikipedia.org bɛ jate yɔrɔ tɔgɔ ye, tiɲɛ na, wikipeja ye org TLD (yɔrɔ sanfɛla) ka yɔrɔ fitinin dɔ ye. Domani tɔgɔ o tɔgɔ dafalen bɛ se ka kɛ jatigila ye walima domani fitinin ye.

Domain tɔgɔ min tɛ domain fitinin si kɔnɔ, o bɛ wele ko apex domain, root domain, walima bare domain. Misali la, wikipedia.org ye Wikipeja ka apex domain ye, min bɛ ɲɛsin yɔrɔ fitinin www.wikipedia.org ma.

Subdomain baarakɛcogo 
A ka c’a la, ɛntɛrinɛti baarakɛlaw bɛ baara kɛ ni subdomains ye minnu bɛ ɛntɛrinɛti baarakɛminɛnw di. U bɛ domani fitinin kelen (walima caman) Di u ka kiliyanw ma minnu t’u yɛrɛ ka domani tɔgɔ sɔrɔ. O bɛ sira Di yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya marali ma kiliyanw fɛ u ka yɔrɔ fitinin kan.

Baara bɛ kɛ ni subdomains ye fana jɛkuluw fɛ minnu b’a fɛ ka tɔgɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ di baarakɛyɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ ma, baarakɛyɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ ma, walima baarakɛyɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen dɔ ma min bɛ tali kɛ jɛkulu la. Misali la, inivɛrisite dɔ bɛ se ka "cs" di ɔridinatɛri dɔnniya baarada ma, walasa jatigila damadɔ bɛ se ka baara kɛ o yɔrɔ fitinin kɔnɔ, i n’a fɔ www.cs.example.edu.

Domain fitinin dɔw bɛ yen minnu lakodɔnnen don kosɛbɛ i n’a fɔ WWW ani FTP. O bɛ sira Di sigicogo dɔ ma min kɔnɔ, domani kɔnɔ, marako ɲɛbilasɛbɛnw ni dosiyew bɛ yen minnu kɔnɔ FTP ɲɛbilasɛbɛnw ni ɛntɛrinɛti yɔrɔw bɛ yen. FTP yɔrɔ fitinin bɛ se ka kɛ ni jatebɔsɛbɛnw ni ɛntɛrinɛti yɔrɔw ɲɛbilasɛbɛnw ye, k’a sɔrɔ WWW yɔrɔ fitinin kɔnɔ, ɛntɛrinɛti yɔrɔw ɲɛbilasɛbɛnw bɛ sɔrɔ. Dafalen yɛrɛmahɔrɔnyalen don yɔrɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ la, o bɛ doncogo kɔlɔsili di domani hakɛ suguyaw kan.

Baara minnu bɛ kɛ ni a ye

Angletɛri jamana na 
Angletɛri jamana na, dakun filanan tɔgɔw ye sariya ye, wa u bɛ bolofara bɔ sanfɛyɔrɔ la. I n'a fo:

 .ac.uk - kalanko (kalansobaw, kalansobaw ani ɲininikɛyɔrɔw) ani kalanso jɛkuluw
 .co.uk - baarakɛcogo caman (a ka c’a la jago siratigɛ la) .
 .gov.uk - gɔfɛrɛnaman (cɛmancɛ ni sigida) .
 .judiciary.uk - kiritigɛlaw (u bɛna don sen kan waati nataw la)[5]
 .ltd.uk - sosiyete danmadɔw
 .me.uk - baarakɛcogo caman (a ka c’a la, mɔgɔ yɛrɛ ta ye) .
 .mod.uk - Lakana minisiriso ni HM sɔrɔdasi foroba yɔrɔw
 .net.uk - ISPw ni réseau sosiyetew (a tɛ i n’a fɔ .net, baarakɛcogo dan ye o baarakɛlaw dɔrɔn de ye)
 .nhs.uk - Jamana ka kɛnɛyako baaradaw
 .nic.uk - réseau baarakɛcogo dɔrɔn (Nominet UK) .
 .org.uk - baarakɛcogo bɛɛ lajɛlen (a ka c’a la, tɔn minnu tɛ tɔnɔ ɲini) .
 .parliament.uk - pariti baarakɛcogo (Angletɛri ka pariti ni Ɛsipeɲi Pariti dɔrɔn de kama) .
 .plc.uk - forobaciyɛnko tɔnw
 .police.uk - polisiw ka fanga
 .sch.uk - Sigida kalanko ɲɛmɔgɔw, lakɔlisow, balikukalan ni balikukalan, sigida kalan

Vanité domaine (yɔrɔ min tɛ foyi ye). 
Vanity domain ye ISP ka domaine yɔrɔ fitinin ye min bɛ tali kɛ baarakɛla kelen-kelen ka jatebɔsɛbɛn na, walima domain fitinin min bɛ mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ jira, a tɔgɔ sɛbɛnna min tɔgɔ la.

Server kulusi 
"WWW2" bɛ 'yɔrɔ Labɛn yan. A man kan ka ɲagami ni WW2 ye.

Ka kɛɲɛ ni baarakɛcogo ye, sɛbɛn min bɛ domani kɔnɔ, walima domain fitinin dɔ bɛ se ka ɲɛsin jatigila tɔgɔ ma, walima baarakɛminɛn min bɛ di masin damadɔ fɛ kulu kɔnɔ. Siti dɔw bɛ baara kɛ ni subdomain suguya wɛrɛw ye walasa ka sèrwɛri kulu suguya wɛrɛw jira. Misali la, www.example.com bɛ Server Cluster 1 walima Datacentre 1 jira, ani www2.example.com bɛ Server Cluster 2 walima Datacentre 2 wdfl jira.

Domini fitininw ni ɲɛbilasɛbɛnw 
Subdomains (yɔrɔ fitininw) tɛ kelen ye ni directories (directions) ye. Annuaire ye foli farikoloma ye ɔridinatɛri yɛrɛ kɔnɔ, k’a sɔrɔ domain fitininw ye URL yɔrɔ dɔ ye min bɛ se ka bila dosiye walima foli suguya bɛɛ la min bɛ sèrwɛri masin kan.

title: Kalashnikov marifa
text:
Kalashnikov marifa (Irisikan na: Калашников) ye marifa otomatiki suguya o suguya ye min sinsinnen bɛ Mikhail Kalashnikov ka dilan fɔlɔ kan. U bɛ Weele fɔlɔ Irisikan na ko "Avtomát Kaláshnikova" (Irisikan na: Автома́т Кала́шникова, lit. 'Kalashnikov ka marifa otomatiki'), nka u bɛ Weele kosɛbɛ ko Kalashnikovs, AKs, walima Irisikan na, "Kalash" dɔ. U tun bɛ dilan fɔlɔ Soviyetiki jamana na, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la Kalashnikov Concern fɛ, fɔlɔ Izhmash, nka nin marifa ninnu n’u suguyaw bɛ dilan sisan jamana caman wɛrɛw la. Kalashnikov ye marifa ye min bɛ kɛ ka caya diɲɛ kɔnɔ, a jate la, marifa miliyɔn 72 bɛ sɔrɔ diɲɛ kɔnɔ.

Dalifɛnw tariku 
Taamaʃyɛn min kɛra ka baara daminɛ marifa misɛnnin otomatiki kura dabɔli la Soviyetiki sɔrɔdasikulu ye, o kɛra Technique Conseil ka lajɛ ye min kɛra URSS jamana ka lafasalitɔn ka fanga kɔrɔ Zuluyekalo tile 15 san 1943, o min kɛra, o kɛra sababu ye ka Alemaɲi marifakisɛ MKb.42 (H) (StG-44 nata prototype) dilancogo sɛgɛsɛgɛ ani k’a kalan, Hugo Schmeisser ye min dilan diɲɛ kɔnɔ, ka ɲɛsin diɲɛ kɔnɔ masa cɛmancɛ kariti fɔlɔ ma, n’o ye milimɛtɛrɛ 7,92 Kurz kalifa 7,92 × milimɛtɛrɛ 33 ye, ka fara Ameriki ta kan light self-loading carbine M1 Carbine (Garand) supplied under the Lend-Lease program chambered for .30 Carbine caliber 7.62 ×33 mm, nafa kɔlɔsira ka sɔrɔdasi bilenmanw ka marifaw sɔrɔ minnu ni Ameriki ni Alimanjamana ta bɔlen don, nka a yiriwara ka don jateminɛ kɛ Soviyetikiw ka dilan kalanso kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw na ani iziniba in cogoyaw la, min tiɲɛna kosɛbɛ kɛlɛ san fɔlɔw la, ka fara kariti "cɛmancɛ" hakilina dɔnni kan.

Katiri kura in misali fɔlɔw dabɔra OKB-44 kɔnɔ kalo kelen kɔnɔ lajɛ kɔfɛ, wa a dilanni min tɛ seriyali ye, o daminɛna san 1944 marisikalo la.

San 1943 Nowanburukalo la, N. M. Elizarov ni B. V. Semin ye milimɛtɛrɛ 7,62 cɛmancɛ-kariti kura dilancogo ja ni a ɲɛfɔcogo ci jɛkuluw bɛɛ ma minnu sen bɛ marifako kura labɛnni na. O waati la, a ka kalifa tun ye milimɛtɛrɛ 7,62x41 ye, nka o kɔfɛ, a labɛnna kokura, wa a nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ, o waati la, karitɔn jiginna ka kɛ milimɛtɛrɛ 7,62x39 ye.

Marifa kura min bɛ cɛmancɛ-karitɔn kelen jukɔrɔ, o tun ka kan ka kɛ ni marifa ye, ka fara karɔbɔli ni marifa nɔgɔlen kan.

O marifa in tun ka kan ka se ka marifa cicogo ɲuman di mɛtɛrɛ 400 ɲɔgɔn ma, o min tɛmɛna marifakisɛw jiralan bɛnnin kan, wa a tun man dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ marifaw la minnu bɛ so kɔnɔ marifakisɛ girinman ni sɔngɔ gɛlɛn dɔ kama. O y’a to a sera ka marifa misɛnnin kelen-kelen bɛɛ lajɛlen bila u nɔ na ka ɲɛ ni Kɛlɛbolo bilenman ye, min tun bɛ baara kɛ ni pistoli ni marifakisɛw ye ani Shpagin ni Sudaev marifa fitininw, Mosin marifa ani karɔbɔli modɛli caman minnu sinsinnen bɛ a kan, Tokarev yɛrɛ- marifa doni, ka fara marifakisɛw kan.

SCS, min bilala baara la san 1949, sɔrɔdasi ɲɛmɔgɔw y’u jigi da min kan, i n’a fɔ Mosin marifa minɛbaga dabɔlen, o dilanna waati kunkurunnin kɔnɔ (fo ka se san 1970 daminɛ ma) k’a sababu kɛ a musaka ka bon n’a ka gɛlɛya ye ni a bɛ tali kɛ ɲɔgɔn na ka bɔli kɛ, ani Degtyarev marifa in bilala RPK modɛli nɔ na min dilanna M. T. Kalashnikov fɛ min bɛ baara kɛ ni 7,62 × 39 mm kariti ye min bɛ bɛn marifa ma.

Masina yɛrɛ yiriwali siratigɛ la, a tɛmɛna dakun caman fɛ, wa a ye ɲɛɲini damadɔ Kɛ minnu na, dilanbaga suguya caman ka sistɛmu caman tùn bɛ u sen na.

San 1944, ka kɛɲɛ ni sɛgɛsɛgɛli jaabiw ye, AS-44 binkannikɛlan min dilanna A. I. Sudayev fɛ, o yamaruyara ka yiriwa ka taa a fɛ. A Bɔra 'sèn misɛnninw na, sɔrɔdasi-kɔrɔbɔli minnu Kɛra sàn nata kaban ni samiyɛ la GSOVG la, ka Fàra sɔrɔdasi-kulu damadɔ kan URSS jamana kɔnɔ. Hali ni seginnkanni ɲumanw kɛra, sɔrɔdasi ɲɛmɔgɔw y’a ɲini ka dɔ bɔ marifaw hakɛ la.

Sudayev ka saya ye baara ɲɛtaa wɛrɛw tigɛ o modɛli in kan, o la san 1946, kɔrɔbɔli-taama wɛrɛ Kɛra, min tùn bɛ Mikhail Kalashnikov la, ale min tùn ye marifa modɛli caman Dabɔ kaban o waati la. O san kelen in nowanburukalo la, a ka porozɛ min ye binkannikɛlan ye, o Sɔnna, wa kalo kelen o kɔfɛ, Kalashnikov binkannikɛlan kɔrɔbɔli fɔlɔ min bɛ Weele tuma dɔw la ko AK-46, o Kɛra marifafeereso la dugu kɔnɔ ka Kovrov, ka fara Bulkin ni Dementiev ka misaliw kan, olu bilala ka taa sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛ. Kalashnikov ye sugandi min sugandi, o kɛra sababu ye ka da a kan, wa a sɔngɔ man gɛlɛn. « O waati kelen na, binkannikɛlan in yɔrɔ tun ka dɔgɔn kosɛbɛ a tigɛtuma na, a minɛni tun ka nɔgɔn, a tun bɛ ni “muɲuli” fɔlen ye o waati la, n’o ye marifa ba 18-20 ye, nka a tun bɛ se ka marifa ba 100 muɲu. A tun bɛ to ji jukɔrɔ, k’a su nɔgɔ la, k’a siri mɔbiliw la, k’a sama jamana siraw kan fo kilomɛtɛrɛ 30. O kɔfɛ, masin in ye baara kɛ ka ɲɛ, ”sɛgɛsɛgɛlikɛla dɔ y’o fɔ Mise ni Ɲɛjirali yɔrɔ la. M. T. Kalashnikov Vadim Khokhlov  ye baara kɛ ni min ye.

A dabɔra san 1946, o modɛli in tun tɛ ni AK nata cogoya caman ye. Baarakɛcogo sariya tun ye gazi pisini sɔgɔli surun ye sanni ka janya. A ka cocking bololanɛgɛ tun bɛ numan fɛ, a tun tɛ kinin fɛ, fuse-translateur nɔ na min tun bɛ kinin fɛ, darapo fuse danfaralenw ni tasuma suguya bamanankanfalen tun bɛ yen. Trigger mechanism farikolo kɛra ka siri ka jigin ani ka taa ɲɛfɛ pinɛ kan.

K’a bɛɛ lajɛlen ta, marifa suguya saba tun bɛ nin waati in na: AK-46 No 1, AK-46 No 2, AK-46 No 3. AK-46 No 3 - a suguya min ni AK-46 tɛ kelen ye No 2 dɔrɔn ni nɛgɛdaga ye min bɛ foli duguma, in kɔnɔ k’a sɔrɔ AK-46 #2 bɛ ni jiribolo ye min tɛ se ka bɔ. Danfara minnu bɛ AK-46 No 1 ni AK-46 No 2/3 cɛ, olu ka bon kosɛbɛ. Hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ ko bololanɛgɛw bɛ Taa ɲɔgɔn fɛ, bololanɛgɛw dakunw tɛ kelen ye wa AK-46 No. 2/3 ta la, a tɛ i n’a fɔ AK-46 No. AK-46 No 2/3 bololanɛgɛ sanfɛla la, yɔrɔ dɔ bɛ yen walasa ka dɔ bɔ sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛ tabaga ni a minɛbaga datugulan cɛ. Ka fara o kan, danfara bɛ bololanɛgɛ tabaga yɛrɛ bilali la jaabilan kɔnɔ. AK-46 No 1 ka bololanɛgɛ tabaga bɛ sɔrɔ a minɛbaga ka nɛgɛsira kan. Jaabiw yɛrɛ fana tɛ kelen ye. O AK-46 No 1 sugu bɛ sɔgɔ, AK-46 No 2/3 bɛ sɔgɔ ni timbre ye, ni magazine sɔrɔyɔrɔ jan ye. I n’a fɔ aw b’a dɔn cogo min na, taamasiyɛn kɛcogo ma yiriwa ka ɲɛ san 1940 waatiw la, AK-46 No 2/3 fana tɛ bɔ o la, a sɔrɔbaga kɛra ko a ma ɲɛ sɔrɔ k’a sababu kɛ a dilanni filiw jatebaliya ye ani a ka gɛlɛya kojugu.

Nka, sɔrɔdasi minnu bɔra sugandili jɛkulu la, olu y’a ɲini ko cocking bololanɛgɛ ka bila kinin fɛ, bawo, n’a bɛ sɔrɔ numan fɛ, n’a bɛ marifa ta walima n’a bɛ taa kɛlɛyɔrɔ la, a bɛ wuluwulu marifatigi farikolo la fana aw bɛ fiyɛli ni tasuma bamanankan-falen-falen fara ɲɔgɔn kan ka kɛ fɛn kelen ye k’a bila kinin fɛ walasa ka bɔli yelen bɛɛ bɔ a sɔrɔbaga kinin fɛ pewu.

Kɔrɔbɔli kɛyɔrɔ ka fɛɛrɛbɔ rapɔɔri kuncɛcogo fɔlɔ la, min labɛnna sɛgɛsɛgɛliw ɲɛmɔgɔ U.I. Pchelintsev fɛ, Kalashnikov binkannikɛlan ma laadi walasa ka yiriwali wɛrɛw kɛ. Nka o dantigɛli sugu tun bɛ yen dalilu jɔnjɔnw tun bɛ yen minnu tun bɛ se ka kɛ misali wɛrɛ o misali ye. O la, a laban na, dilanbaga ka ɲinini fɛ, kalan wɛrɛw kɛra, minnu ɲɛmɔgɔya tun bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛli baarada ɲɛmɔgɔ bolo marifa kelen-kelen V. F. Lyuty ni komisiyɔn ɲɛmɔgɔ N. S. Okhotnikov ka sɔnni ye. Sɛgɛsɛgɛli wɛrɛ min kɛra AK-46 dilanni kan n’i y’a suma ni Bulkin ni Dementev ka misaliw ye, o y’a jira ko sababu caman bɛ yen walasa ka dɛsɛ minnu jirala Kalashnikov dilanni na, olu bɔ yen. Kɔrɔbɔli yɔrɔ ka laɲiniw n’a ladilikanw waleyacogo minnu kɛra walasa ka sigida in sigicogo kura labɛn, a sɛbɛnbaga y’a jira minnu na, a kɛra i n’a fɔ u bɛ se ka sɔrɔ, wa u nɔgɔyara ka tɛmɛ sigida tɔw labɛnni kan. Ka kɛɲɛ ni ɲɔgɔndan komisiyɔn ka jaabi labanw ye, Kalashnikov binkannikɛlan ye jɔyɔrɔba ta ɲɔgɔndankɛlaw cɛma. U. I. Pchelintsev ka hakilina jiginna ka kɛ a kɔkanna ye. Sisan a y’a jate ko AK-46 de ka fisa ni tɔw bɛɛ ye, wa a bɛ se ka ɲɛtaa sɔrɔ.

Kɔlɔsiliw

title: Alabatoso min bɛ bonya da Seraphim senuma kan min bɛ bɔ Sarov la Raev dugu kɔnɔ
text: Alabatoso min bɛ bonya da Seraphim senuma kan min bɛ bɔ Sarov la Raev dugu kɔnɔ - Ɔrɔmu Ɔrɔmu ka egilisi dɔ, min bɛ Moskow Worodugu-Kɔrɔnfɛla marabolo la. A bɛ miniti 10 taama na ka bɔ Medvedkovo metoro gari la. Briki batoso min bɛ ni kuru saba ye, o dabɔra jɛkulu mɔgɔ 1000 ye. Alabatoso janya ye mɛtɛrɛ 43 ye. Alabatoso in bonya bɛɛ ye 1100 sq ye. mɛtɛrɛw ye. Alabatoso kɔnɔna na, mara ni sɔrɔko sow fana bɛ yen, hakili ni kalanso ani da dɔ min bɛ ni egilisi butiki ye. Kitabumaraso bɛ batoso la, dimansila kalanso dɔ dabɔra denmisɛnw ni mɔgɔkɔrɔbaw ye, dɔnkilidalakuluw, seko ni dɔnko kalanso ani ɲɛnajɛso dɔ labɛnna.

title: Dumile Feni
text:
Articles with hCards
Articles with hCards
Zwelidumile Geelboi Mgxaji Mhlaba "Dumile" Feni (Mekalo tile 21, san 1942 – 1991) tun ye bi waanɛ min bɔra Farafinna Woroduguyanfan. A lakodɔnnen don Katlego Lhuzwayoboth kama. Jɛgɛncogo tun b'a ka jadila n'a ka ɲɛgɛnniw kɔnɔ. U tun bɛ to ka siyawoloma kɛlɛli Farafinna Woroduguyanfan kɔnɔ jira min tɔgɔ ye Apartheid ye. Feni m'a wari soro a ka baara la. Tiɲɛ yɛrɛ la, a tun bɛ jɔnya la ani faantanya jugumanba la.

Ɲɛnamaya daminɛ na 
Feni tun wolola foro sɛnɛyɔrɔ dɔ la Withuis Worcester, Cape Province, Farafinna Woroduguyanfan. A wolofa tun ye Geelbooi Magoqwana, jagokɛla ani kibaru duman fɔbaga. Wa a bamuso tun ye Bettie Nothemba Mgxaji min tun ye jagokɛla muso. A denmisɛnaman, Feni ka denbaya yɛlɛmana ka taa Welcome Estate la, Cape Town. A ka mɔgɔw tun ye San mɔgɔw ye.

Baara 

Feni ka baara caman tun bɛ siyawoloma tuma jira Farafinna Woroduguyanfan fɛ. Ka damine san 1968 fo k'a ban san 1991, a sigilen tun do bɛ Lɔnduru, Los Angeles ani New York cɛ.  

A yɛlɛmana ka taa Ameriki san 1978. A tun ye dɔnkotigi ye min sigilen tun bɛ Farafinna hadamadenya kalanso la Los Angeles, Kalifɔrni Kalansoba la. 

Mɔgɔ gansan min bɛ Farafinna Woroduguyanfan bi binna tɛ Dumile Feni ka baara dɔn. Wa Farafinna Woroduguyanfan  bi seko ni dɔnko tɔnba b’a wele ko ‘Goya of Townships’. Dumile Feni tun ka ɲi n'a ye kosobɛ .

Sɛbɛnni-sɛbɛn 
Sɛbɛnnikɛlan dɔ bɔra 2010 min tɔgɔ ye ko Zwelidumile. A dabɔra Afiriki tilebinyanfan filimu dilabaga Ramadan Suleman fɛ.

Mɔgɔ yɛrɛ ka ɲɛnamaya 
Feni tɔgɔ fɔlɔ ye Zwelidumile. A kɔrɔ ye "mɔgɔ min lakodɔnnen don jamana fan bɛɛ la". 

Denmuso dɔ tun bɛ Feni bolo min tɔgɔ ye ko Marriam Diale.

Ɲɛjiraliw

title: John Rugoiyo Gichuki
text:
John Rugoiyo Gichuki ye karamɔgɔ ni sɛbɛnnikɛla ye min be bɔ Kenya jamana na. A ye sebaaya sɔrɔ BBC ka Farafinna tulonkɛlajɛ la san 2006 n’a ka tulonkɛ Eternal, Forever.  Wa a ye BBC ka Farafinna ɲɛnajɛ tulonkɛ sɔrɔ san 2004 n’a ka tulonkɛ A Time for Cleansing, min bɛ cɛnimusoya kɛli ani mɔgɔ gɛnnenw kun kan Rwanda.

title: Joël Mpah Dooh
text:
Joël Claude Mpah Dooh ye kalanden ye min ye dɔnniyasɛmɛtiyasɛbɛn sɔrɔ Conservatoire Municipal des Beaux-Arts of Amiens (Faransi) la.

A ka baara fɔlɔ minnu kɛra kanpaɲi kan, olu bɛ filiform mɔgɔw dɔ jira min dusu kasira wa mun be ka kisi ɲini. A ka baara kɔfɛtaw kɛra duguba sɛbɛnniw ye kosɛbɛ, minnu ni graffiti bɛ bɔla ɲɔgɔn na. A ka kɔrɔbɔliw y’a to a ye baara kɛ yɔrɔ saba la, volume min b'a ka ja fɔlɔ mɔgɔw jira, ka mɔgɔ suguya wɛrɛw ka faantanya kɔrɔ fɔ minnu tora u yɛrɛ bolo. A bɛ baara kɛ ni fɛn wɛrɛw ye i n’a fɔ fugan. A bɛ ɲɛgɛnni l'a kan k'a siyɛn. A bɛ baara kɛ ni Plexiglas sɛbɛnw, k'olu siyɛn fana wa a bɛ yeelen kɛ ka ja nɔ bɔ sɛbɛnw la.

Doual'art ye baara naani sɔn Douala ma san 1992. O naani dɔ la, kelen ye ale ta ye. K'a to baarakɛjɛkulu do la, min bɛ ɔridinatɛri dɛmɛni ka ja dilancogo jira, Kameruni dɔnkotigiw ka “dekan” Koko Komégné n'ale u ye ɲɔgɔn ye. A ye teriya kɛ n'ale ye ka Kheops kulu jɛkulu sigi 1994. Joel Mpah Dooh tun ye ŋana dɔ ye min tun welela Scénographies Urbaines de Douala la san 2002. A y’a sen don tonw ni ɲɛjiraliw caman na, minnu y’a lase Nizeriya, Farafinna Woroduguyanfan tilebinyanfan, Senegali, Ameriki, Kuba, Liban ani Faransi. San 2007, u y'a wele Fondation Blachère à Apt (Faransi) la walasa ka sigiyɔrɔmako seriyali daminɛ min tɔgɔ ye ko Art et entreprise.

title: Rainbow-boa
text:
Daɲɛ fɔlɔ 
Sa Rainbow Boa, min lakodɔnnen don a ka kulɛriw jiracogo kabakoma fɛ ani a ka sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛ iridescentes, o ye sa suguya ye min bɛ mɔgɔ minɛ, a bɛ sɔrɔ Ameriki Saheliyanfan sanji kungow kɔnɔ. Nin daminɛkuma in bɛ Rainbow Boa sa in ɲɛfɔli surun di, wa a bɛ sira Di baro ma a cogoya n’a kulɛriw kan.

Sanji Boa (Epicrates suguya) bɛ suguya caman Lamini, i n’a fɔ Berezil Sanji Boa (Epicrates cenchria) ani Kolonbi Sanji Boa (Epicrates maurus). O sa ninnu tɔgɔ bɔra u ka ɲɛnajɛko kabakoma n’u ka cogoya la min tɛ se ka sɔrɔ, o bɛ sa kanubagaw ni sigida kanubagaw bɛɛ hakili sama.

Sanji Boas bɛ dɔn u ɲɛda cogoya fɛ min bɛ mɔgɔ kabakoya, u bɛ dɔn ni balansi ye minnu bɛ kulɛri ɲɛnama caman jira. K’a ta bilenmanw ni oranjɛ tasumamanw na ka taa a bila buluw ni bulama nɛnɛmanw na, a bɛ iko u balansi bɛ kulɛriw kaleidoscope jira. Yeelen ka ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ u ka balansi iridescentes kan, o bɛ ɲɛnajɛ dɔ lawuli min bɛ mɔgɔ minɛ, min bɛ kɔlɔsilikɛlaw bila siran na.

Dakun nataw la, an bɛna sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛ kosɛbɛ Sanjiba Boa farikolo ɲɛfɔli la, k’u kulɛri kɔfɛ fɛɛrɛw sɛgɛsɛgɛ, k’u jɔyɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛ kungo kɔnɔ, ka baro kɛ kulɛriw ni u cogoyaw caman ɲɔgɔnna kan, ani ka maga u ka diyabɔli la i n’a fɔ sokɔnɔbaganw. Ni an y’u yecogo n’u kulɛriw ka gɛlɛya faamuya, an bɛ se k’o sa kabakoma ninnu ka fɛn kabakomaw waleɲumandɔn.

Scale iridescent ani kulɛrilenw: 
    1. Kulɛriw cogoya: Sanjiba Boas tɔgɔ bɔra u ka kulɛri ɲɛnamaw fɛ. U ka balansi bɛ se ka ɲɛ suguya caman jira, i n’a fɔ bilen, oranjɛ, jɛman, wuluwulu, bulu ani bulama. A ka c’a la, kulɛriw bɛ Labɛn ka Kɛ ‘yɔrɔ ye min bɛ Taa ‘yɔrɔ la min bɛ Taa u farikolo janya la.

    2. Iridescence: Rainbow Boas ka balansi bɛ ni iridescence ye, o kɔrɔ ye ko u kulɛriw bɛ i n’a fɔ u bɛ Changé walima ka wuli ka kɛɲɛ ni kɔlɔsili kɛrɛ ni yeelen cogoya ye. O fɛn kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen in bɛ fɛn dɔ fara u yecogo kan min bɛ mɔgɔ kabakoya, bawo u ka balansi bɛ manamana ani ka kulɛri suguya wɛrɛw jira.

    3. Jaw: Ka fara u ka balansi kulɛrilenw kan, Rainbow Boas bɛ ja gɛlɛnw jira minnu bɛ dɔ fara u ɲɛnayeli kan. O misaliw bɛ se ka kɛ nɛrɛmuguma, nɔw walima sɛgɛnlafiɲɛbɔlanw ye, minnu ye taamasiɲɛ dibimanw ye u ka balansi kan. O cogoyaw bɛ Se ka Yɛlɛma suguw ni mɔgɔ kelen-kelenw cɛ, o b’a To sa kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ danfara Bɔ.

Kulɛri caman caman cili: 
    Rainbow Boas ka kulɛriw ni a ka iridescence bɛ se ka Changé ka kɛɲɛ ni kɛnɛmafɛnw ye i n’a fɔ yeelen cogoya ani funteni. Ni u bɛ yeelen tilennen na, u ka sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛ bɛ kɛ ka ɲɛ, wa u ɲɛjibɔ bɛ bonya. O kulɛri caman caman cili ye ko ye min bɛ mɔgɔ ɲɛnajɛ, min bɛ dɔ fara u ka mɔgɔ minɛcogo kan.

Ni an ye Rainbow Boas farikolo ɲɛfɔli faamuya, i n’a fɔ u bonya, u farikolo cogoya, u sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛ ani u kulɛri, o b’an dɛmɛ ka jogo kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw waleɲumandɔn minnu b’a to u bɛ mɔgɔ ɲɛnajɛ kosɛbɛ. Dakun nataw la, an bɛna u ka iridescence kɔfɛ fɛɛrɛw sɛgɛsɛgɛ kosɛbɛ, k’u kulɛriw jɔyɔrɔ sɛgɛsɛgɛ kungo kɔnɔ, ka baro kɛ kulɛriw ni cogoyaw caman ɲɔgɔnna kan minnu bɛ sɔrɔ Rainbow Boa suguya kɔnɔ.

Iridescence ani Kulɛri Yɛlɛma 
Rainbow Boas ye iridescence ni color changement min jira, o ye ko ye min bɛ mɔgɔ ɲɛnajɛ, minnu bɛ kɛ sababu ye k’u ɲɛda cogoya kabakoma. Nin dakun in bɛ u ka iridescence kɔfɛ fɛɛrɛw sɛgɛsɛgɛ ani fɛn minnu bɛ nɔ bila u kulɛri caman yeli la.

Iridescence (Iridescence) ye: 
1. Fɛnɲɛnɛma-yɔrɔw : Sanji-yɔrɔ Boa balansi bɛ ni fɛn fitininw ye minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ ni yeelen-fiɲɛw ye. O fɛnw, i n’a fɔ jirisunw, jirisunw walima jirisunw, olu bɛ kɛ sababu ye ka yeelen kari ani ka yeelen bɔ yɔrɔw la minnu tɛ kelen ye. O yeelen bɔli ni a bɔli bɛ Nà ni kulɛri caman yeli ye ni filɛli yɔrɔ bɛ Yɛlɛma.

2. Selective Reflection: Mikoroskɔpikɛminɛn minnu bɛ balansi kan, olu bɛ yeelen janya dɔw jira sugandili la k’a sɔrɔ u bɛ dɔw minɛ. O hakilijakabɔ sugandilen in bɛ na ni kulɛri kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw bɔli ye. Ni yeelen bɛ balansi gosi ka bɔ yɔrɔw la minnu tɛ kelen ye, jikuruw janya minnu bɛ ye, olu bɛ Changé, o bɛ kɛ sababu ye ka iridescence namara ani ka tulon kɛ ni kulɛriw ye minnu bɛ wuli ka wuli.

Kulɛri caman caman cili: 
1. Yeelen cogoya: Sanji Boa balansi bɛ se ka kulɛri suguya wɛrɛw jira ka kɛɲɛ ni yeelen cogoya ye. Ni u bɛ yeelen tilennen na, u sɔgɔsɔgɔninjɛ bɛ kɛ ka ɲɛ ani ka kɛ i n’a fɔ irides. Yɛlɛma minnu bɛ Kɛ yeelen kùnkolo ni a fanga la, olu bɛ Se ka nɔ Blà kulɛri minnu na kosɛbɛ walima minnu bɛ i n’a fɔ u bɛ Yɛlɛma sa farikolo la.

2. Funteni: Funteni fana bɛ se ka nɔ bila Rainbow Boas kulɛri la. Ni sa farikolo funteni bɛ Changé, o bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka a kulɛri fanga caman wuli. Ni funteni ka bon, o bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka kulɛriw yecogo ni u ɲɛnama bonya, ka sɔrɔ funteni nɛnɛman bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka u ɲɛda cogoya dɔgɔya dɔɔni.

3. Lamini ladamuni : A bɛ miiri ko Rainbow Boas ka se k’u kulɛriw ni u ka iridescence Changer, o bɛ dɛmɛ don sigida ladamuni na. U ka sanji-kungo kɔnɔ, u kulɛriw ni u ɲɛw bɛ ɲɔgɔn falen-falen, u bɛ saw dɛmɛ u ka don u lamini na, ka saw dɛmɛ u ka se ka u yɛrɛ dogo u ka fɛnɲɛnamaw ni u ka fɛn minɛtaw la minnu bɛ se ka kɛ u ye.

A nafa ka bon k’a dɔn ko fɛɛrɛ minnu bɛ iridescence ni color changement kɔfɛ Rainbow Boas la, olu bɛ ka sɛgɛsɛgɛ hali bi, wa ɲinini wɛrɛw ka kan ka kɛ walasa ka nin ko ninnu faamuya kosɛbɛ.

Rainbow Boas ka iridescence ani u kulɛri Changement ye fɛnw ye minnu bɛ mɔgɔ minɛ, minnu bɛ kɛ sababu ye k’u bɛɛ lajɛlen ɲɛnajɛ. O jogo kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw, minnu bɛ nɔ bila fɛn fitininw na ani kɛnɛmafɛnw i n’a fɔ yeelen ni funteni, olu bɛ ɲɛnajɛ yelen dɔ Dabɔ min bɛ taa a fɛ ka sa kanubagaw ni ɲininikɛlaw bɛɛ Minɛ.

Dakun nataw la, an bɛna an ɲɛsin kulɛriw jɔyɔrɔ ma kungo kɔnɔ, ka kuma camouflage, suguya dɔnni, ani kumaɲɔgɔnya kan Rainbow Boas cɛ.

title: The Torrent
text:
The Torrent (Fransɛkan na: Le torrent) ye Kanada dramu filimu ye, Simon Lavoie ye min ɲɛminɛ ani a bɔra san 2012. Anne Hébert ka novella Le Torrent bεε bεε bε bεn, filimu in sinsinnen bɛ François ka ɲɛnamaya kan (Anthony Therrien ye min kɛ a denmisɛnman ani Victor Andrés Trelles Turgeon fɛ a balikuya la), cɛ min lamɔna a ba fɛ min tun bɛ diinɛ diinɛba la ani min tun bɛ mɔgɔw tɔɔrɔ Claudine (Dominique Quesnel) ye baara kɛ ni a ye. A tora tulogweren na tuma min na a banna k’a ka ɲinini labato ko a ka don seminɛri la ka kɛ Katoliki sarakalasebaa ye, o y’a to Claudine y’a gosi a kun na, a tora ka sigi togodala yɔrɔ la, wa a bɛ kɛlɛ kɛ walasa ka hadamadenw ka jɛɲɔgɔnya sigi sen kan n’a ye Amica (Laurence Leboeuf) san ), muso min bɛ feere jɔnya la min ni a ba bɔlen don kosɛbɛ a denmisɛnman.

O filimu in jirala fɔlɔ Festival du nouveau sinema la Utikalo san 2012.

O filimu ye Prix Jutra tɔgɔlatɔn wɔɔrɔ sɔrɔ Jutra Jara 15nan na san 2013, ka kɛ ɲɛnajɛla ŋana (Trelles Turgeon), ɲɛnajɛla ŋana (Quesnel), Seko ni dɔnko ɲɛnabɔli ɲuman (Éric Barbeau), Sinema kɛcogo ɲuman (Mathieu Laverdière), dɔnkili fɔlɔ ɲuman (Normand Corbeil ) ani mankan ɲuman (Luc Boudrias, Marcel Chouinard ani Patrice Leblanc).

Ka yelen

Victor Andrés Trelles Turgeon ye François ye

Laurence Leboeuf ye Amica / Claudine (jeune) ye.

Dominique Quesnel ye Claudine ye

Anthony Therrien ye François (denmisɛnnin) ye .
