title: Guosa
text:
Guosa ye kan jɔlen ye min dabɔra fɔlɔ Alex Igbineweka fɛ san 1965. A dabɔra ka kɛ Nijeria jamanadenw ka kanw faralen ye ɲɔgɔn kan ani ka kɛ kan ye ka taa Afiriki Tlebi fɛ.

Kan

title: Italikan na
text:
ye kan ye min bɛ Indo-Erɔpu denbaya ka Romɛkan kulu dɔ la. Itali-Romankan kanfɔcogo ka ca kosɛbɛ .

I n'a fɔ jamana kan caman, bi Italikan ye kanhakɛ ye min bɛ ni " a ye se sɔrɔ k’a yɛrɛ sigi sen kan i n’a fɔ kan kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen min bɛ mara dɔ la min ka bon kosɛbɛ ka tɛmɛ a kanfɔcogo fɔlɔ kan. O cogo la, o tun ye Tuskan kan fɔcogo ye, ka bɔ Florence, Pisa ani Siena, min ye se sɔrɔ, hali n’a tɔgɔ bɔra a cogo la (sɛbɛnni koinè ni Florence basigi nafolotigiya ni dɛmɛ ye ka bɔ Sisili, Latin ani Itali mara wɛrɛw la), a ma kɛ politiki kunw kosɔn i n’a fɔ bɛ kɛ tuma caman na, nka a tun bɛ bonya min lase laadalakow ma. Toscan ye tiɲɛ na kan ye Dante Alighieri, Petrarch ani Boccaccio, minnu jatera Itali sɛbɛnnikɛla ŋana saba ye cɛmancɛla waati labanw na, ye kan min sɛbɛn. O fana ye Florence dugu kan ye, min tɔgɔ bɔra a ka fɛn dilanni cɛɲi n’a ka tariku ɲɛtaa fɛ. O la, a tɛ kabako ye ko Italikan tun ye diɲɛ kan ye kabini waati jan laadalakow ni seko ni dɔnko la, ani ko Erɔpu kanw bɛɛ daɲɛgafe bɛ Italikan daɲɛ caman mara (kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la dɔnkilida la, minnu yɛrɛ bɛ kan wɛrɛw la i n’a fɔ Zapɔnkaw).

Nka, Italikan daɲɛgafe sariyaw bɛɛ ma sigi sen kan fo Renaissance, ni Pietro Bembo ka kanko sinsinni ye, Venetian dɔnnikɛla min ye jɛkafɔ kɛ ni Alde Manuce ye, min ye hakilina jɔnjɔnw sigi kɔnɔ.

title: Seko ni dɔnko kalanso sanfɛla Le Havre-Rouen
text: Seko ni dɔnko kalanso sanfɛla Le Havre-Rouen ( ESADHaR ) ye foroba seko ni dɔnko kalanso sanfɛla ye min bɛ kɛ ni kalanso fila ye, kelen bɛ Le Havre, tɔ kelen bɛ Rouen

title: Lagos
text:
Lagos (a bɛ fɔ tubabukan na :  ; Yorubakan na  ) ye Nizeriya duguba dɔ ye  min sigibagaw ka ca ni miliyɔn 15,3 ye  ani duguba filanan ye Afiriki gun kan    Kinshasa kɔfɛ (min kɔnɔmɔgɔw bɛ se miliyɔn 15,6 ma ). A ka ca ni miliyɔn 15,3 ye intramural sigibagaw la, aglomeration kɔnɔ min ka ca ni  ye san 2021, a ye Kayira ni Kinshasa tɛmɛn san 2000 waatiw la, o kɛra push demographic barikama kɔlɔlɔ ye. Lagos ye dugu ye, duguba kɔnɔ, min ka ca ni jamana tɔw bɛɛ ye Afiriki kɔnɔ ka tɛmɛ Kairo (mɔgɔ miliyɔn 20) ani Kinshasa (mɔgɔ miliyɔn 17). 

Jamana faaba kɔrɔ, fo ka se gɔfɛrɛnaman ka baaradaw jiginni ma Abuja san 1991, a fana bɛ ni kurunbonkariyɔrɔba dɔ ye Afiriki kɔnɔ, ani Nizeriya ka izini ni jagokɛyɔrɔba.

A daminɛ na, Yoruba jamanadenw ka kabila dɔ tun bɛ yen, Lagos yɔrɔ in bɛ kɛ gunw dalajɛlen ye kɔji dogolen dɔ kɔnɔ Atlantiki Kɔgɔji kɔnɔ, min bɛ Benin kɔgɔjida dancɛ la. Pɔritigalikaw bɛ gɛrɛ o mara la  ani a fɔra ko u ye dugu tɔgɔ da ka ɲɛsin Lagos kurunboli yɔrɔ ma, taamaw bɔra yɔrɔ min na ka taa Afiriki. A minɛna Benin masaya fɛ san  na walima , Lagosi tun bɛ mara masakɛw fɛ, wa a kɛra jɔnfeere yɔrɔba ye  . San 1861, tubabu y’a kɛ koloni ye ani k’a tɔgɔ da ko Protectorate of Southern Nigeria min sigira senkan san 1914. A tora faaba ye Nizeriya ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya waati la san 1960.

 na, a jamanaden cayara ni mugan ye ani dugubako ma dabila ka jɛnsɛn farafinna kɔnɔ. Dugu cɛmancɛ kɔrɔnyanfan fɛ ( Ikoyi ) ani Victoria gun gun bɛ jamanaden nafolotigiw bisimila, k’a sɔrɔ sigida minnu ka dɔgɔ kosɛbɛ, n’olu bɛ kilomɛtɛrɛ tan caman bɔ cɛmancɛ la, olu ye sɔgɔmadafɛdugubaw ni sobaw ye A lakodɔnnen don a ka dugu yiriwali fɛ min tɛ se ka kunbɛn, ni jamanadenw ka caya hakɛ barikama dɔ ye diɲɛ kɔnɔ, Lagos ka kan ka dugubaw kɔnɔ mɔgɔw ka ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ, fiɲɛ nɔgɔli hakɛ caman ani kojugubakɛlaw ka baara kɛ yɔrɔ minnu na.

Lagos gun mara ye dugu ka jagokɛyɔrɔ ye (CBD), wa a ka kan ka ban ni gun dilannen dɔ jɔli ye kabini san 2009 min tɔgɔ ye ko Eko Atlantic City . Duguba min falen bɛ mɔgɔw la, jamana min bɛ sɔrɔ yiriwali dafalen jira, Lagos fana ye laadalatɔnba ye, a ye seko ni dɔnko tɔnw bange i n'a fɔ Afrobeat ani  a ka filimuko ɲɛnama. A laban na, i n’a fɔ Nizeriya, dugu in kɔnɔ siya caman bɛ yen, wa kerecɛn sigibagaw hakɛ bɛ se silamɛw ma .

title: Afrique-Occidentale française
text:
Faransi Tlebi Afiriki ( AOF ) tun ye gɔfɛrɛnamanba ye min tun bɛ fara ɲɔgɔn kan jɛkulu kelen kɔnɔ Faransi ka koloni 8 kɔnɔ Afiriki tilebinyanfan fɛ san 1895 ni 1958 cɛ .

A sigira sen kan dakun caman na, a labanna ka Moritani, Senegali, Faransi Sudan (bi Mali ), Gine, Kɔdiwari, Nizɛri, Sanfɛ Volta (bi Burkina Faso ) ani Dahomey (bi Benin ) fara ɲɔgɔn kan. A bonya tun ye kilomɛtɛrɛ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen  ye, o bɛ se ka kɛ Faransi ta ye siɲɛ wolonwula ɲɔgɔn . A faaba tun ye Saint-Louis (Senegal) ye fo san 1902, o kɔfɛ Dakar (Senegal).

Jɛkulu min bɛ se ka suma ni o ye, n’o ye Afrique-Équatoriale Française (AEF) ye, o sigira senkan Cɛma Afiriki san 1910 .

Tariku 

Jamanakuntigi kura dɔ, Faransi Tlebi Afiriki, Dabɔra on senegali, Faransi Sudan, Gine ani Côte d'Ivoire dɔrɔn ka jɛkulu fɛ. Faransi Tlebi Afiriki jamanakuntigiba, min fana ye, a daminɛ na, Senegali jamanakuntigi ye, a sigilen bɛ Saint-Louis . A tɔgɔ fɔlɔ ye Jean-Baptiste Chaudié ye . E, senegali banki bɛ kɛ Afiriki tilebinyanfan banki ye . A dabɔra foroba sosiyete dɔ cogo la, a ye nɛɛma sɔrɔ ka bɔ. Banki tun bɔra Saint-Louis kaban ka taa Dakar. San 1902, faaba yɛrɛ bilala Dakar fo ka se federasɔn in tiɲɛni ma. Kabini san 1895, Senegali jamanakuntigi de bɛ Faransi Tlebi Afiriki jamanakuntigiba ka baara fana ta. San wolonwula baara kɛlen kɔfɛ, a jɛlen don ko doni girinya kojugu, o kɔfɛ, o jɔyɔrɔ fila bɛ fara ɲɔgɔn kan. Ernest Roume ye mɔgɔ laban ye min ye o manda fila in fara ɲɔgɔn kan.

san 1903 sariya dɔ ye lakɔliso sigicogo dabɔ Faransi Tlebi Afiriki kɔnɔ ani san 1904 kalanko sɛgɛsɛgɛlikɛlaw ka kulu dɔ dabɔra ani ka dege min bɛna kɛ san 1916 École William Ponty ye San 1904, koloni wɔɔrɔ tun bɛ yen : Senegali, Senegali sanfɛla ani Nizɛri, Moritani, Gine, Côte d'Ivoire, Dahomey . Sɔrɔdasi nɛrɛmaw bilala baara la diɲɛ kɛlɛ fɔlɔ waati la ani san 1917 Blaise Diagne, min sugandira ka kɛ depite ye san 1914, bilala Senegali marifatigiw tali kun na . San 1919, koloni kura min dabɔra Upper Volta ani Togo jamana yamaruyalen nɔrɔla Franse Tlebi Afiriki la. Kolonɛli ka ɲɛtaa taamasyɛn, nɛgɛsira min bɔra Dakar ka taa Nizɛri, o sera Bamakɔ san 1923.

San 1921, jatebɔ dɔ y’a jira ko  bɔra Faransi Tlebi Afiriki la, Togo tɛ yen (  ) 

San 1931 Dugukolo kan Kolonɛli jirali min kɛra Bois de Vincennes, o kɛra koba ye min tun laɲinin bɛ ka koloniyali mansamara fanga jira. Angkor batoso sigili sen kan kokura, Faransi Tlebi Afiriki darapo ka kɛlɛbolo ye o ko nafama dɔ ye. [ ref. wajibiyalen don ] .
Article à référence nécessaire
.

Sɛtanburukalo san 1940, tuma min na Franse Equatorial Afiriki tun ye a bɛɛ lajɛlen lajɛ ka kɛ Faransi kɛlɛbolo ye, Faransi Tlebi Afrika Gofɛrɛnaman Jenerali Pierre Boisson tora kantigiya la Vichy fanga ma ani ka dɛsɛ kɛ jɛkuluw ka sɔrɔdasiw ka jigin cɛsiri la, o kɛra kɔgɔjida kɛlɛ ye min bɛ wele ko Dakar kɛlɛ walima " " . Baarakɛcogo Bagabagali ". ". ". O kɔfɛ san 1942 laban na, Boisson y’a jira k’a bɛ dɛmɛ don Amiral Darlan ma, min tun ye fanga ta Alzeri , jɛkuluw ka jigin kɔfɛ Faransi Worodugu Afiriki  . Darlan salen kɔfɛ, Boisson tora Jenerali Giraud ka sigiyɔrɔ la. Giraudist ni Gaullist fanga faralen kɔ Faransi jamana hɔrɔnya jɛkulu kɔnɔ, Faransi Tlebi Afiriki ye ɲɔgɔn lajɛ jenerali de Gaulle kɔfɛ .

Sariyasen dɔ min bɛ tali kɛ baara jagoya banbali la Faransi Tlebi Afiriki kɔnɔ, o dabɔra Fasokanw ka lajɛba fɛ san... Houphouët-Boigny sariya tɔgɔ la. o san kelen in na , Lamine Gueye sariya bɛ jamanadenya di Faransi tɔnba jamanadenw bɛɛ ma min sigira sen kan sisan, ka Code de l' indigénat ban .

Fɛderasiyɔn in ma jɔ san 1958 Sɛtanburukalo la, jamanadenw ka lajɛba kɔfɛ Faransi jɛkulu nata kan, ani jamanadenw ka maraw ye wote kɛ walasa ka wuli ka kɛ yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya jamanaw ye, fo Gine, min ye wote kɛ yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya kama.

Gine ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya san 1958 ani jamana tɔw ta san 1960, o kɛra Franse Tlebi Afrika laban ye. A bonya tùn ye bam  ye wa a tùn ka ca ni miliyɔn 25 ye a bɔli waati la [ ref. wajibiyalen don ] .
Article à référence nécessaire
.

O kɔfɛ, Kɔdiwari, Nizɛri, Vɔlta sanfɛla ani Dahomey ye Union Sahel-Benin ani Conseil de l’Entente sigi senkan min ma mɛn.

Sɔrɔ 

San 1930 waatiw la, mɔgɔ 2 dɔrɔn de % jamanadenw bɛ baara kɛ sara kama.

K’a sababu kɛ jatebɔw ye minnu tɛ se ka da u kan caman na, san hakɛ dɔ yɔrɔ fitinin dɔ ye sɔrɔdasi baara kɛ min man di mɔgɔw  kosɛbɛ, o min, fɛn wɛrɛw cɛma, ye baarakɛjɛkuluw di foroba nafa porozɛw ma

Sɛnɛko siratigɛ la 
Franse Tlebi Afiriki sɔrɔko bɛ tali kɛ kosɛbɛ sɛnɛko siratigɛ la, min kɔnɔ dugukolonɔn sɛnɛni jɔyɔrɔ tun bɛ ka bonya kabini san 1920, o kɔfɛ san 1930, ani a ye nafa sɔrɔ sɔngɔba la kosɛbɛ Diɲɛ Kɛlɛba Filanan waati la.

Minɛko baarakɛyɔrɔ 
Kɛlɛw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ waati la, dugukoloko sɛgɛsɛgɛli ani minɛnko yiriwali Franse Tlebi Afiriki la, o tun bɛ kɔfɛ kosɛbɛ Angilɛw ka maraw la o mara kelen kɔnɔ. Faransi ka tɔn si tun tɛ yen min tun bɛ se walima min tun b’a fɛ ka ɲinini ni minɛnko ɲɛnabɔ nin mara in kɔnɔ min ma dɔn kosɛbɛ ani min ka minɛnw man ɲi.

O bɛɛ n’a ta, dugukoloko dɔnnikɛla dɔw, i n’a fɔ Jean Malavoy  walima Fernand Blondel, tun ye hakilinaw Changé dɔɔnin, u kɛlen ka dugubaw kɔnɔ jagokɛlaw diyabɔ Mansamara yɔrɔ in ka nafoloba min bɛ sɔrɔ fɛnɲɛnamafagalanw na. Ka fara o kan, kabini san 1930 cɛmancɛ la, kɛlɛ wɛrɛ jigiya kɛra sababu ye ka nafa dɔɔnin lakunu o koloni ninnu nafolo la. Nka san 1939 mobilizasiyɔn ye dan sigi min ka kan ka wele ko minɛnko ɲinini cɛsiri waati Faransi Tlebi Afiriki. Kalan cidenyabaarakɛlaw tiɲɛna, minɛnw bilala walima u seginna u ka jamana na.

San 1939, AOF ka sanu bɔli sera nɛgɛ kilo , a fanba bɔra aluvium nafabɔli la ni sanu panni laadala fɛɛrɛw ye Kot divoire, Faransi Sudan ani kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la  Sanfɛ

Gine bɛ diamant dilan kabini san 1936. San fila ka kɔn o ɲɛ, ɲininikɛla dɔ tun ye kabakurun fɔlɔ sɔrɔ Makona baji da la. O fɛn dilanni fanba bɔra Macenta, Gine Sanfɛla la, yɔrɔ min na Gine ɲinini ni minɛnko tɔn (SOGUINEX), n’o ye Faransi-British baarakɛda ye, o ye baara kɛ ni sɛnɛfɛnw bilayɔrɔw bɛɛ ye. 10 fo 15 dɔrɔn % ka bɔ san kɔnɔ sɛnɛfɛnw na , minnu tun bɛ ci Angletɛri, olu tun ye biyew ye ; a tɔ tun bɛ kɛ izini baara kama.

Ilmenite, min ye titaniyɔmu minɛn nafama ye ani, ka dɔgɔya, nɛgɛ, o fɔra ka bɔ Senegali kɔgɔjida la kabini san 1931. Titaniyɔmu bɔli cɛncɛn nɛrɛmaw la kɔgɔjida la, o tun ka nɔgɔn kosɛbɛ wa a bɔli sera  ma san 1939.

nɛgɛ sɔrɔli fɔlɔ minnu kɛra Kaloum gun kan Gine jamana na, olu daminɛna  . Sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛra san 1930 waatiw la, o tun ye dancɛ kɛ kabakurunbɔyɔrɔ la, min tun bɛ kilomɛtɛrɛ  ni kɔ bɔ Conakry dugu la ka se Kakoulima massif sen ma. Nafolo jatera ka kɛ tɔni  ye, nɛgɛ hakɛ ye 52 ye %. O jidagayɔrɔ in jɔyɔrɔ min bɛ kɔgɔjida la, n’o ka surun kɔgɔjida la, o y’a to a kɛra sababu ye ka fɛnɲɛnamafagalan in bɔ nɔgɔya la, ni minɛnw tun bɛ Conakry kurunboli yɔrɔ la nɛgɛsira fɛ.

Loos gunw bɛ kɛ gunw ye minnu bɛ Kaloum gun kɛrɛfɛ. Ameriki ka tɔn dɔ ye ɲinini min kɛ san 1920 waatiw la, o kɛra sababu ye ka bokisiti sɔrɔyɔrɔw sɔrɔ, minnu maralenw tun bɛ se tɔni  ma, ni alumina hakɛ ye 53 ye %. Nafa sɔrɔli yamaruya tun dira Compagnie des Bauxites du Midi ma kabini san 1932, nka san 1940, o laban in tun ma se ka baara wajibiyalen kɛ.

Sani diɲɛ kɛlɛba filanan ka kɛ, Service des Mines ka kuluw ye Moritani jamana ka nafolomafɛnw jira . Fort-Gouraud, o minɛn in tun bɛ hematite cogo la ni nɛgɛ hakɛ bɛ se 69 ma % ani nafolo maralenw jatera ka tɛmɛ tɔni  kan. Ka fara o kan, Akjoujt ye fɛnɲɛnamafagalan suguya caman dilan kabini san ba caman. San 1931 yɛrɛ la, Jean Malavoy tun ye nɛgɛ jirali kofɔ o mara kɔnɔ. Delineation drilling san 1941 y’a jira ko a bɛ sɔrɔ tɔni  sulfure min kɔnɔ, nɛgɛ tɔni  ani sanu ni nɛgɛ hakɛ ma ɲɛfɔ. Nka kabini a daminɛ na, Moritani porozɛw nana ni gɛlɛya ye min ye ka sɛnɛfɛnw bila jamana kɔkan. Tiɲɛ na, minɛnko kurunbonkariyɔrɔ min tun ka surun Fort Gouraud la, o tun ye Villa-Cisneros ye min bɛ Ɛsipaɲi Sahara . A tun bɛna kɛ wajibi ye ka nɛgɛso kilomɛtɛrɛ  jɔ walasa ka Rio de Oro tɛmɛ, o kɔfɛ, ka ji jugu kurunbonkariyɔrɔ dɔ da ex nihilo Nouakchott walima Port-Étienne walasa ka jago kɛ ka taa ni a ye. Ka fara o kan, gɛlɛyaw tun bɛ ji ni kuran na.

title: Valencia (France)
text:
Valence (  : Valença
Categoría:Wikipedia:Artículos con texto en occitano
lamɛnni)), a bɛ fɔ fana ko Valence-sur-Rhône, ye Faransi dugu ye ani komini min bɛ Drôme mara la, Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes mara la. tariku kɔnɔ, a ni Dauphiné mara kɔrɔ bɛ tali kɛ ɲɔgɔn na .

title: Lausanne
text:
Lausanne (  ) ye dugu ye Suwisi jamana na min bɛ Jenɛfu baji woroduguyanfan fɛ . Vaud kanton faaba , a fana ye Olɛnpi faaba ye ani Lausanne mara faaba . O ye duguba naaninan ye jamana kɔnɔ dugudenw hakɛ fɛ  Zurich, Jenɛfu ani Basel kɔfɛ. san  la, Lazane dugu kɔnɔ  bɛ yen, ani Lazanɛ kuluba kɔnɔ,  bɛ yen . San 2012, a bɛ 50 Sɔrɔ % jamanadenw na ani 60 % baara minnu bɛ Vaud kanton kɔnɔ  .

Lausanne dugu ka kalanso dɔ bɛ Lausanne Tlebi mara la min kɔnɔ , Lausanne Iniwɛrisite (UNIL) ani Lausanne Politekniki Lakɔli Fɛderasiyɔn (EPFL) bɛ yen,  ɲɔgɔn bɛ min kɔnɔ    Aglomerasiɔn in fana ye iniwɛrisite tɔgɔba dɔw sigiyɔrɔ ye i n’a fɔ Ecole hôtelière de Lausanne (EHL), Ecole cantonale d’art de Lausanne (ECAL) ani diɲɛ ɲɛmɔgɔya yiriwali baarada (IMD).

Lausanne bɛ danfara don ni diɲɛ tɔnba caman ye minnu ni farikoloɲɛnajɛ bɛ tali kɛ ɲɔgɔn na, a bɛ minnu ladon. Kabini san 1915, dugu in kɛra Dugukolo kan Olɛnpi jɛkulu (IOC) ɲɛmɔgɔso ye, ani diɲɛ farikoloɲɛnajɛ tɔnba ni jɛkulu bi duuru ɲɔgɔn  ani fana farikoloɲɛnajɛ kiritigɛso (CAS) ani Erɔpu biro min bɛ diɲɛ tɔnba la Doping kɛlɛli (WADA). Dugu in tɔgɔ fɔlɔ ye ko... Olɛnpi faaba kabini san 1993  ani ka fonɛnɛ kamalenninw ka Olɛnpi kɛ san 2020 .

Fɛdɛrali kiritigɛso (TF), n’o ye Suwisi jamana ka kiritigɛsoba ye, o sigira senkan Lausanne.

title: Napoléon Ier
text:
Napoléon Bonaparte, a bangera san Ajaccio dugu kɔnɔ ani a sara ka taa a fɛ gun kan min tɔgɔ ye ko Saint Helena, tun ye Faransi sɔrɔdasi ni jamanatigi ye, Faransikaw ka masakɛ fɔlɔ ye san Fɛ ani Fɛ, n' a tɔgɔ ye ko  .

Charles Bonaparte ni Letizia Ramolino den filanan, Napoléon Bonaparte kɛra jenerali ye Faransi jamana fɔlɔ kɛlɛbolow la, a bangera Revolisiyɔn fɛ, san 1793, yɔrɔ min a kɛra kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la Itali kɛlɛbolo ɲɛmɔgɔba ye ani o kɔfɛ kɔrɔnfɛla kɛlɛbolo . A nana fanga la san 1799 ni coup d'etat ye san 18 Brumaire, a kɛra Consul fɔlɔ ye  fo ka se, don min na Mansamara bɛ weleweleda ni senatus-consultum ye, o kɔfɛ, jamanadenw ka lajɛba bɛ kɛ . A ye masafugulan don masakɛ la, Notre-Dame de Paris ka katedrali kɔnɔ, kan, Pape  fɛ, waati kelen na n' a muso Joséphine de Beauharnais ye .

I n’a fɔ jenerali kuntigi ani jamana kuntigi, Napoléon y’a ɲini ka jɛkuluw tiɲɛ minnu sigira senkan ani ka wari sɔrɔ Angletɛri masaya fɛ ani minnu, kabini san 1792, ye Erɔpu masakɛw lajɛ ɲɔgɔn fɛ Faransi n’a ka fanga kama min bangera Revolisiyɔn fɛ. A ye Franse kɛlɛbolow ɲɛminɛ ka bɔ Itali ka taa Nil ani ka bɔ Ɔtirisi ka taa Prusse ani Pologne : Bonaparte ka sebaaya caman ni cɛɲiw ( Arcole, Rivoli, Pyramides, Marengo, Austerlitz, Jena, Friedland ), sɔrɔdasi kanpaɲi teliyalenw na, o bɛ jɛkulu naani fɔlɔw bɔ u nɔ na. Hɛrɛ minnu tugura ɲɔgɔn kɔ, minnu ye nin jɛkulu kelen-kelen bɛɛ ban, ye fanga di Faransi ma ani ka fanga hakɛ dɔ di Napoléon ma min tun man teli ka kɛ Erɔpu jamanaw na fɔlɔ, Tilsit hɛrɛ waati la (1807).

Napoléon ye Jamana ladilan tuma bɛɛ, k’a ka fanga n’a ka ɲɛmɔgɔya segin a cogo kɔrɔ la. Faransi bɛ ka bɛlɛkisɛ nafamaw sɔrɔ, minnu bɛ Napoléon kɛ bi Faransi sigidaw sigibagaw dɔ ye. O siratigɛ la, Napoléon ka kodɔn, san 1804 sariyasun fana sen bɛ o la, o b’a to a bɛ se ka mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ka hɔrɔnya walima jamanadenw ka bɛnkan sabati sariya ɲɛkɔrɔ, ka baara kɛ ni sinsinnan ye ni bɛlɛkisɛ dɔw garanti ye ani ka laadala sariyakolow daminɛ kokura minnu bɔra Kɔrɔlen na Régime ( maracogo ) . Faransi ka mara labɛnna kokura, ni prefew dabɔli ye departemanw kɔnɔ . O cogo kelen na, wari kura dɔ bɔra kɛnɛ kan, n’o ye franc ye, k’a sɔrɔ Banque de France sigira sen kan. Conseil d’Etat fana dabɔra, i n’a fɔ lycées .

Napoléon fana y’a ɲini ka fanga di Franse koloniyali mansamara ma min tun ye Ancien Régime ye kɔgɔjida la. K’a sɔrɔ Haiti ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya bɛ wuli ka taa yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya la nin koloni in kɔnɔ, Napoléon ye jɔnya segin a cogo kɔrɔ la san 1802, seginkanni min a b’a fɛ ka kɛ waati dɔɔnin kɔnɔ, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya bali min laseli kɛra gun in fɛ Jenerali Toussaint Louverture fɛ Halibi politiki kunw kosɔn, Napoléon ye Luiziana feere kokura Ameriki ma cogo min na san 1803. Nka, a bɔnɛna koloni fanba la minnu tun b’a fɛ tubabukan na, ani a bɔnɛna Santo Domingo la sɔrɔdasi-taama tɛmɛnen kɔ (1802-1803), min laɲini tun ye ka faranfasibagaw kɛlɛ.

Napoléon ye Franse jamana ta ka se a bonya ma Erɔpu, ni  ye san 1812, ka Romɛ, Hamburg, Barselona walima Amsterdam caman tigɛli kɛ ka kɛ Faransi marabolow dugubaw ye. A tun ye Itali jamana jamanakuntigi ye fana kabini san 1802 fo san 1805, Itali masakɛ ye kabini san 1805 fo san 1814, Suwisi jamana ka cɛsiribaa kabini san 1803 fo san 1813 ani Rhin ka tɔnba lakanabaa kabini san 1806 fo san 1813. A ka sebaayaw y’a to a sera ka marabaw minɛ Faransi ani ka Erɔpu gun fanba mara a kɛtɔ k’a ka denbaya kɔnɔmɔgɔw bila masasigilan caman kan. : Joseph tun bɛ Naples o kɔfɛ Ɛsipaɲi, Louis tun bɛ Hollande, Jérôme tun bɛ Westphalie ani a balimakɛ Joachim Murat tun bɛ Naples. A ye Duchy of Warsaw fana da, k’a sɔrɔ a ma Pologne ka yɛrɛmahɔrɔnya segin a cogo kɔrɔ la, ani ka fanga dɛsɛlenw bila waati dɔ kɔnɔ i n’a fɔ Prusse Mansamara ani Ɔtirisi Mansamara a ka fanga kɔrɔ.

U kɛlen ka wari di jɛkuluw ma minnu tun bɛ ka caya ka taa a fɛ, jɛɲɔgɔn minnu tun bɛ Faransi kɛlɛ, olu labanna ka ɲɛtaa jɔnjɔnw sɔrɔ Ɛspaɲi ( Vitoria kɛlɛ ) ani Alimanjamana ( Leipzig kɛlɛ ) san 1813. Napoléon ka 'kɔnɔnafili o kɔtigɛwalew ɲɛkɔrɔ, o y'a To a ma Faransi jamana yɔrɔ bɛɛ ka dɛmɛ Bɔ, k'a sɔrɔ a jɛɲɔgɔn kɔrɔw walima a ka fanga kɔrɔw y'u Yɛlɛma a kama. A nana ka fanga bila san 1814 Pari minɛni kɔfɛ, Franse Mansamara faaba, ani ka lafiɲɛbɔ kɛ Elba gun kan, a y’a ɲini ka fanga sɔrɔ kokura Faransi, Tile kɛmɛ waati la san 1815 A sera ka Faransi minɛ kokura ani ka mansamara fanga segin yen k’a sɔrɔ a ma marifa ci, o bɛɛ n’a ta, a ye jamana bila sira salen na ni Waterloo ka dɛsɛba ye, min ye kɛlɛ ban.Napoléon Mansamara ani a ye Bourbon ka masaya seginni sabati . A ka saya jɔnya la, Saint Helena kan, Angletɛri ka mara kɔnɔ, o ye sɔsɔli caman ye.

Subject from his lifetime of a golden legend as well as a black legend, a ka juru bɛ a tɔgɔjuguba la kosɛbɛ a ka sɔrɔdasi seko la, min saralen don ni sebaaya caman ye, ani a ka politiki sira kabakoma na, nka a ka fanga fana ye min ye fangatigi ye ani min bɛ cɛmancɛ la kosɛbɛ fana dɔrɔn ka se a ka laɲini ma, min bɛ na ni mɔgɔfaga kɛlɛw ye ( Pɔritigali, Ɛsipaɲi ani Irisila ) ni mɔgɔ miliyɔn caman fagalenw ni joginlenw ye, sɔrɔdasiw ni siwiliw Erɔpu jamana bɛɛ kama. [Jɔn fɛ?] ko a ye komandanba dɔ ye tariku kɔnɔ, wa a ka kɛlɛw n’a ka kanpaɲiw bɛ kalan sɔrɔdasi kalansow la diɲɛ fan bɛɛ.

Kanuya laada dɔ bɛ Napoléon kɛ " cɛba welelen don ka diɲɛ wuli. Nin ye cogo ye Comte de Las Cases, Mémorial de Sainte-Hélène sɛbɛnbaga, y’a ɲini ka Napoléon jira Angletɛri Parlement la, a ka ɲinini sɛbɛn dɔ kɔnɔ min sɛbɛnna san 1818. Élie Faure, a ka baara kɔnɔ Napoléon, min ye Abel Gance ka filimu bila senkan, o bɛ a suma a ka a “ . bi kira ". ". ". Sɛbɛnnikɛla wɛrɛw, i n'a fɔ Victor Hugo, olu bɛ Hɛlɛna senuma ka se sɔrɔlen kɛ " Prometheus bi in na ". ". ". Dugukolonɔn min bɛ... Napoléon le Grande a sirilen bɛ Balzac, Stendhal, Musset ka baara caman kan, nka Dostoyevsky, Tolstoy ani mɔgɔ caman wɛrɛw fana ka baara. Ka fara o kan, Faransi politiki kurunba dɔ bɔra kɛnɛ kan san , Bonapartisme, min b’a fɔ ko Napoléon ka wale n’a ka gɔfɛrɛnaman cogoya.

title: Premier Empire
text:
Franse Mansamara, min bɛ wele ko a posteriori Mansamara Fɔlɔ , ye Franse mansamara fanga ye ka bɔ..., don min na Napoléon Bonaparte ye Faransi masakɛ ye senatus-consulte fɛ, fo ka se a ka fanga bilali fɔlɔ ma san, o kɔfɛ a segintɔ Pari kan ka se  ka Komisiɔn ka faranfasi ma san . Fɔlɔ min jatera i n' a fɔ Repibiliki Fɔlɔ tɛmɛsira, ka sɔrɔ ka tɔgɔ fɔlɔ ta  .san 1809, a tugura Konsila kɔ, a tigɛra Seginkanni Fɔlɔ  sanni a ka fanga segin a cogo kɔrɔ la tile kɛmɛ kɔnɔ, o kɔfɛ, seginkanni filanan kɛra

Mansamara fɔlɔ danfaralen don ni politiki fanga tɔw ye Faransi Tariku kɔnɔ fɔlɔ a daminɛ fɛ (a bɛ politiki sigicogo dɔ daminɛ min tun ma deli ka kɛ fɔlɔ Faransi, Mansamara ), o kɔfɛ a ka kɛlɛ fɛ ( Napoléon kɛlɛw ye Franse ye ka tugu ɲɔgɔn na ka jɛkulu duuru kɛlɛ kabini san 1805 fo ka se san 1805 ma 1815 sàn na ). o kɛlɛw y' a to Napoléon bɛ se ka Erɔpu gun fanba minɛ, Skandinavi jamana ma fara a kan . Ni a taara a ka farafinna bonyaba la ( kilomɛtɛrɛ  farala a kan), o kɔfɛ Faransi ye marabolo 135 sɔrɔ, dugubaw i n'a fɔ Romɛ, Hamburg, Barselona, Amsterdam walima Ragusa kɛra Faransi marabolow faaba ye

Sɔrɔdasi sebaaya caman ni kabakomaw ( Austerlitz, Jena, Auerstadt, Eylau, Friedland, Wagram ), o farafinna ɲɛtaa ninnu nana ni bɔnɛba sɔngɔ ye cɛw la (  Faransi fan fɛ) ani kɔtigɛbaliya koloniyali siratigɛ la, ɲɛmɔgɔya ka se Faransi jamana fɔlɔ tununni ma, ka se Luiziana feereli ma san 1803, ka fara Ɛndujamana Tlebi jamana dɔw minɛni kan Angletɛri fɛ, min tun ye Revolisiyɔn jugu ye ani kɔgɔjiw matigi. Franse ka dɛsɛ segin-segin ka Angletɛri gunw minɛ ( , Trafalgar kanpaɲi ) tiɲɛ na, tubabu ye wari di jɛkuluw ma minnu tugura ɲɔgɔn kɔ minnu ye se sɔrɔ mansamara kɛlɛbolow kan san 1814, Risi kanpaɲi jiginni latigɛlen kɔfɛ, dɛsɛ min kɛra fɛɛrɛko siratigɛ la min bɔra Grande Armée tɛna kɛnɛya.

O tun ye Franse mansamara fila fɔlɔ ye minnu sigira sen kan Bonaparte ka masaya nafa kama.

Mansamara bɛ daminɛ ka taa a fɛ, tuma min na senatus-consultum ye Napoléon Bonaparte weleweleda ko “ . Faransikaw ka masakɛ ". ". ". A ka jamanadenw ka lajɛba min kɛra bɛ o tɔgɔ in Sɛmɛntiya.

Mansamara Fɔlɔ bɛ ban (Napoléon ka fanga bilali Fontainebleau, a ka fanga minɛni fɔlen kɔfɛ Pari on Senat fɛ, ani bɔli kan ka ɲɛsin Elba gun ma ). O kɔfɛ, Bourbons Segin-ka-bɔnye, min bɛ tigɛ ni Tile kɛmɛ ye Fɛ .

title: Buuru
text:
Buru ye siya caman ka laadala dumuni ye. a bɛ dila ni mugu ni ji ye wa a ka c' a la kɔgɔ bɛ sɔrɔ a la . Fɛn wɛrɛw bɛ fara a kan ka kɛɲɛ ni buru suguya ye ani a labɛncogo laada la. Ni mugu walima funteni farala a kan, buruburu mugu bɛ funu ka a sababu kɛ a mɔli ye .

Buru bɛ sɔrɔ ni mugu tobi, laadala foro kɔnɔ, walima buruburu, walima fɛɛrɛ wɛrɛw fɛ (misali la kabakurun funtenimanw). Buru dilanni (panification) ye buru dilannikɛla ka jago ye . buru in bɛ feere tuma caman na burufefeerelaw fɛ .

Mugu bɛ bɔ burukisɛw de la kosɛbɛ — malo nɔgɔlen (malo), spelt walima rye . A bɛ se ka kɛ ka mugu fara a kan, ni hakɛ danmadɔ ye, ka bɔ dumunifɛn wɛrɛw la minnu tɛ buru dilan i n’a fɔ shɔ, orje, malo durum, ɲɔ, shɔ, noye, a ɲɔgɔnnaw Buru sumanw bɛ dɔn ni farikolojɔli dumuniw ye minnu bɛ se ka a gluten ni elastic properties, min bɛ gazi ɲuman bugunw minɛ minnu bɛ bɔ fermentation fɛ, o bɛ sira di mugu wulicogo ma, min bɛ wele ko  ka kurukurunin da .

O sɔgɔli in, n’o bɛ Weele ko dɔlɔmugu, o bɛ etanɔli Bɔ ka Fàra gazi ɲuman kan, o min bɛ Kɛ lafiɲɛbɔ ye tobilikɛtuma na.

title: Alemaɲikan na
text:
Ye Ɛndu-Erɔpu kan dɔ ye min bɛ bolofara Alemaɲikan denbaya kɔnɔ. a ka kanhakɛ caman kosɔn, Alemaɲi ye sanfɛkan ye fo ka se hakɛ dɔ ma (  ).

a tariku, i n' a fɔ kan min ni tilebin tlebinyanfan kan tɔw tɛ kelen ye, o bɛ daminɛ cɛmancɛla waati sanfɛla la, kanɲɛ filanan jiginni waati .

 na , a kumanaw, minnu bɛ wele ko " " . alemaɲikan fɔbagaw ”, bɛ tilatila kosɛbɛ, ni kumalasela miliyɔn 100 ɲɔgɔn bɛ yen, Erɔpu jamanaw na, o min b’a to u ka kan bɛ fɔ kosɛbɛ Erɔpu tɔnba kɔnɔ (UE) i n’a fɔ fasokan .

title: Matematiki
text:
Jatebla (walima jatebla ) ye dɔnniya jɛlen ye min bɛ Bɔ hakilinata-jɔ- cogow la minnu bɛ Kɛ fɛn suguya caman kan i n'a fɔ jatebla kuluw, jatebla, cogoyaw, sigicogo, fɛn caman tigɛli  ; ka fara jatebɔ jɛɲɔgɔnyaw ni baarakɛcogo kan minnu bɛ o fɛnw ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ. U fana ye ɲininikɛyɔrɔ ye min bɛ o dɔnniya in yiriwa, ka fara kololi kan min b’a kalan.

U bolofara damadɔ b'u bolo i n'a fɔ : jatebɔ, jatebɔ, jateminɛ, jateminɛ, jateminɛ, jateminɛ, dannaya  danfara dɔ fana bɛ jatebɔ saniyalen ni jatebɔ waleyali cɛ .

Jatebla bɛ danfara Bɔ dɔnniya tɔw la ni jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen ye ni tiɲɛ ye bawo kɔlɔsili ni ko kɛlen tɛ tali Kɛ fɛn farikolomaw la. ; jatebɔ tɛ dɔnniya ye min bɛ kɛ ni ko kɛlenw ye . U ye hakili-la-ko ye pewu, u sinsinnen bɛ aksiyɔmuw kan minnu fɔra tiɲɛ ye walima postulates ( fɔcogo) minnu Sɔnna waati dɔɔnin kɔnɔ. O aksiyɔmu ninnu de b’a jusigilanw Kɛ wa o la u tɛ Bɔ kumasen wɛrɛ la. Jatebla kumasen – min bɛ Weele kosɛbɛ, a tiɲɛni kɔfɛ, teori, proposition, lemma, fact, scholia walima corollary – o bɛ jate ko tiɲɛ ye ni kumasen fɔlɔ min b’a ka tiɲɛ sigi sen kan, o bɛ hakililata dɔ bonya min bɛ wele ko demonstration, walima logical-deductive reasoning. kuma min ma jira fɔlɔ nka o bɛɛ n' a ta a jatera ko a bɛ se ka da a la, o bɛ wele ko jateminɛ .

Hali ni jatebɔ jaabiw ye tiɲɛ ye min bɛ kɛ cogo la min bɛ kɛ cogo la, u bɛ baara sɔrɔ dɔnniya wɛrɛw la ani fɛɛrɛ kuraw la . O cogo la Eugene Wigner b'a jira ko     ye .

title: Grenoble Ecole de Management
text: Grenoble Ecole de Management (GEM) ye jagokɛla ka kalanso ye min bɛ Grenoble, Faransi. GEM dabɔra san 1984, a bɛ kalan di, ɲɛmɔgɔya diplomuw ye AMBA, EQUIS ani AACSB ka laseli ye.

title: ChatGPT ye
text: kɔlɔsilikɛla dɔw y' u hami jira ChatGPT bɛ se ka hadamadenw ka hakili bɔ a nɔ na walima k' a tiɲɛ, ani a bɛ se ka kɛ sababu ye ka kunnafonidilanw sonya walima ka kunnafoni tiɲɛnenw lawuli .

title: Dado Coletti
text:
Dado Coletti, Riccardo Broccoletti ka ɲɛnajɛ tɔgɔ, a bangera Awirilikalo tile 27 san 1974 Rome, a ye Itali ɲɛnajɛla ye, telewisɔn ɲɛmɔgɔ ani arajo ɲɛmɔgɔ.

Ɲɛnamaya kɛcogo 
A tɔgɔ sɛbɛnna Enzo Garinei ka lakɔli la, a y’a ka jɔyɔrɔ fɔlɔ kɛ Teatro Sistina la, ka t’a fɛ k’a ka kalan kɛ ni kalanw kɛli ye mime ni dubbing la.

Denmisɛnw ka telewisɔn ɲɛmɔgɔba don, a ye baara kɛ san 1991 Disney Club la, a tora yen fo san 1994, o kɔfɛ a seginna san kelen o kɔfɛ fo san 1999 ni Francesca Barberini ye fila-fila. O san na, a ye telewisɔn ka ɲɛjirali dɔ fana kɛ min tɔgɔ ye ko Big!

San 1999 a ka ko fɔlɔ kɛ telewisɔn ɲɛnajɛla ye, ni Morte di una ragazza perbene (Npogotigi bonyalen dɔ ka saya) ye, min ɲɛmɔgɔya tun bɛ Luigi Perelli bolo. Sisan, a ye arajo ɲɛmɔgɔ ye Rai Isoradio la.

title: Nizɛri gɛlɛya min kɛra san 2023
text: San 2023 Nizɛri gɛlɛya bɛ tali kɛ ko kɛlenw na minnu kɛra fanga tiɲɛni kɔfɛ Nizɛri, jamana jamanakuntigi ka kɔlɔsilikɛlaw ye jamanakuntigi Mohamɛdi Bazoum minɛ min kɔnɔ, ani jamanakuntigi ka kɔlɔsilikɛlaw ɲɛmɔgɔba, jenerali Abdourahamane Tchiani a y’a yɛrɛ jate sɔrɔdasijɛkulu kura ɲɛmɔgɔ ye     O jaabi la, zuluyekalo tle 30, san 2023, Afiriki Tlebi jamanaw ka sɔrɔko jɛkulu (CEDEAO) ye dɔgɔkun kelen di Nizɛri jamana ka fanga tiɲɛni ɲɛmɔgɔw ma walasa u ka Bazoum segin fanga la walima ka diɲɛ jamanaw ka sankɔrɔta ni fanga baara kɛ.   O waati dantigɛlen banna awirilikalo tile 6 san 2023, wa CEDEAO ye yamaruya di k’a ka sɔrɔdasi reservew baara teliya la awirilikalo tile 10. CEDEAO ye a sen don Gambia jamana na ka tɛmɛn walasa ka demokarasi lasegin san 2016-2017 sariyasunba gɛlɛya kɔfɛ.

title: Afiriki tilebinyanfan jamanaw ka sɔrɔko jɛkulu
text:
Afiriki tilebinyanfan jamanaw ka sɔrɔko jɛkulu ( CEDEAO / CEDEAO n' a tɔgɔ surun ye faransikan ni tubabukan na ) ye marabolo kulu ye min kɔnɔ jamana tan ni duuru bɛ Afiriki tilebinyanfan fɛ . A sigira sen kan san 1975 mɛkalo tile 28 ni bolonɔbila ye Lagos bɛnkansɛbɛn na, a ka baara ye ka sɔrɔko jɛɲɔgɔnya sabati mara in kɔnɔ.

A jatera Afiriki sɔrɔko jɛkulu jɔyɔrɔ dɔ ye, jɛkulu in sigira senkan ni laɲini ye ka "yɛrɛlabɛn jɛlen" sɔrɔ a ka jamanadenw ye, n’o ye ka jagokɛjɛkulu kelen, belebeleba dɔ sigi senkan sɔrɔko ni jagokɛlaw ka tɔnba sababu fɛ. A fana bɛ Kɛ hɛrɛ sabatili fanga ye o mara kɔnɔ.  O mara in bɛ kan saba baara foroba la minnu nafa ye kelen ye: Faransikan, Angilɛkan ani Pɔrtigɛkan .

CEDEAO ye baarada fila ye, CEDEAO SekErEtariat ani CEDEAO ka nafolodonni ni yiriwali banki, a tun bE wele ko JErEnkErEnkErEnnenya bolofara fo ka se a tOgO bEnbaliya ma san 2001. James Victor Gbeho, min ye Gana jamanakuntigi ka ladilikɛla ye jamana kɔkankow la, ale bɛ baara kɛ sisan Komisiɔn ɲɛmɔgɔ ye. jamanakuntigi min bɛ yen sisan, o ye Nizeriya jamanakuntigi Goodluck Jonathan ye .

Jɛkulu mɔgɔ dɔw donna a kɔnɔ ani ka bɔ a kɔnɔ sanw kɔnɔna na. San 1976, Kap Verde farala CEDEAO ni Moritani kan, minnu tun donna san kelen ka kɔn o ɲɛ (san 1975 hali ni a kɛra tɔn in dabɔlen kɔfɛ), o bɔra yen san 2000 Desanburukalo la,  a y’a jira k’a b’a fɛ k’o kɛ san 1999 desanburukalo la)

title: Ala ka Laɲini
text:
Divine Providence (pro "before" clairvoyance "to see/lead an end") ye diinɛ hakilina ye min fɛ ala dɔ bɛ diɲɛ mara ani ka nɔ bila a la, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la Dugukolo hadamadenya dɛmɛni kama. o ye diinɛ ka kalansira ye, min bɛ alaɲɛsiran kɛlɛ min dalen bɛ ala la min ye danfɛn dɔrɔn de ye .

A nɔfɛmɔgɔw bɛ to ka baara kɛ ni daɲɛ ye Ni Senu, min ɲɛfɔlen don ko ‘ Ala ka tiɲɛ ’ ka kɛ Ala ni hadamadenw cɛma.

A ka c’a la, Ala ka ladonni bɛ taa ni hakilina ye ko Ala yɛrɛ b’a fɛ k’a yɛrɛ jira tariku sɛbɛn dɔ fɛ, Tanaj, Bibulu, Kuranɛ, misali la, b’a ka baara kɛ yɔrɔ min na.

title: Patriotismo
text:
Baara in bɛ kɔngɔ jira min kɛra Madrid jamanadenw fɛ Napoléon ka mara kɔnɔ, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la siwili kulu dɔ min banna sɔrɔdasi binkannikɛlaw ka dɛmɛ na.]]
faso kanu ye hakilina ye min bɛ mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ni a faso cɛsiri . O ye dusukunnata ye min bɛ hadamaden na a faso walima a lamɔ dugukolo kan, a b’a miiri ko nafa dɔw, kanuya dɔw, laadalakow ani tariku dɔw sirilen bɛ min na. A man kan ka ɲagami ni jɔyɔrɔ wɛrɛw ye : Fasoden kɔrɔta kojugu dunan ɲɛkɔrɔ, o bɛ wele ko chauvinisme ;  k’a sɔrɔ daɲɛ wɛrɛw minnu bɛ tali kɛ ɲɔgɔn na, olu ye jingoist (ka binkanni lafasa jamana wɛrɛw ma)  ani jingoistic (faso kanu dusukunnataw kɔrɔta waati tɛmɛnen) .

title: Chosun ka lotɛli
text:
Japon Gofɛrɛnaman-Jenerali min nana Kore gun mara k’a ɲɛsin Kore gun ma ni Kore ni Japon ka bolonɔbila ye san 1910, o y’a laɲini ka sigiyɔrɔ dɔ jɔ faaba la, Gyeongseong-bu (bi Seoul), ko tun bɛ se ka dunan danbetigiw sɔrɔ ka bɔ Zapɔn walima jamana wɛrɛw la. Ani Hwangudan yɔrɔ dɔ, Joseon masakɛ tun bɛ bɛnbaw ka laadalakow kɛ yɔrɔ min na, o tiɲɛna iko Japon gɔfɛrɛnaman-Jenerali min bɛ Kore nɛgɛso la, o ka tɔnba dɔ, ani Utikalo tile 10, san 1914, Tlebi jamanaw cogoya lotɛli sabanan min bɛ Kore gun kan, o tugura o kɔ Daebul min bɛ Incheon (1888) ani Sontag Hotel (1902), o dabɔra.A ye lotɛli dɔ da wuli (Japonkan na: 朝鮮ホテル Chosen Hotelu[*]). Chosun lotɛli tun bɛ Kore jamana ka Japon gɔfɛrɛnaman jenerali ni Gyeongseong Gara cɛ cɛmancɛ la, Gyeongseong gɔfɛrɛnaman ka boon kɛrɛfɛ, wa a ni Chosun Banki cɛ ye mɛtɛrɛ 300 ye, o de y’a to a kɛra yɔrɔ ɲuman ye. Lotɛli in dilanna Georg de Lalande fɛ, Alemaɲi fɛn dilabaga dɔ min sigilen bɛ Zapɔn, wa Otis ye alifanta dɔ jɔ a kɔnɔ.[1] Japon ka so jɔli baarada min tɔgɔ ye ko Shimizugumi, o de ye o jɔli baara kɛ. Yɔrɔ in ye pyeong 6750 ye, duguma yɔrɔ ye pyeong 583 ye, so hakɛ ye 69 ye, ani mɔgɔ 108 bɛ se ka don a kɔnɔ. Ka fara sow jɔlenw kan Zapɔn jamana ka mara waati la walima Japon cogoya la, yɔrɔ cogoya caman yeli ani fɛnw cɛɲi kɔlɔsira kosɛbɛ. Tlebi jamanaw ka laadalakow caman donna lotɛli in kɔnɔ Japon fɛ, o kɔfɛ, a kɛra lotɛli ye min tun bɛ baara kɛ fana i n’a fɔ dunankɛyɔrɔ Kore gun kan, i n’a fɔ Deikoku lotɛli min bɛ Tokyo. Lotɛli kunnafoniw

Tuma min na Kore jamana hɔrɔnyara Awirilikalo tile 15, san 1945, Josenhoteru ko fana jiginna kosɛbɛ. Japon Gofɛrɛnaman Jenerali min tun bɛ Kore jamana na, o tiɲɛna, ani lotɛli baara bɔra Zapɔnkaw bolo ka taa Korekaw la. U.S. sɔrɔdasi minnu tun bɛ Kore gun saheliyanfan mara, Seoul fana sen bɛ o la, olu ka sɔrɔdasiw ka gɔfɛrɛnaman sigiyɔrɔ tun bɛ o lotɛli in kɔnɔ, ka fara Rhee Seung-man ni mɔgɔ wɛrɛw ka birow kan minnu seginna u ka so.

Kore jamana ka gɔfɛrɛnaman sigili kɔfɛ san 1948, a ye masaya kɛ i n’a fɔ Seoul, faaba ka lasigiden lotɛli. O kɔfɛ, lotɛli tɔgɔ jiginna ka bɔ Zapɔnkan na “Josen Hotel” ka kɛ Korekan na “Chosun Hotel” ye, k’a sababu kɛ Syngman Rhee ka fanga ka Japonkan bɔli politiki ye.O lotɛli in, i n’a fɔ Chosun Ilbo, tora tɔgɔ la ko ‘Chosun Hotel ' ani a tun bɛ kɛ sɔrɔdasiw ka lafiɲɛbɔyɔrɔ ye Kore kɛlɛ waati la ani Ameriki sɔrɔdasi 8nan ka sɔrɔdasi sigiyɔrɔ ye, sanni a ka segin Kore gɔfɛrɛnaman ma san 1961.

Chosun Hotel ka kɛ mɔgɔ kelen ta ye, o kumana ka kɔn san 1962 ɲɛ, nka a ma kɛ,[2] ani san 1982 tilebin fɛ, Samsung Group ye a ta.

San 1970, lotɛli in tiɲɛna Japon ka mara waati la, ka kɛ lotɛli ye min bɛ sankanso 20 kɔnɔ, ani jamanakuntigi Park Chung-hee y’a sen don dakun daminɛ seli la. San 1981, a tɔgɔ jiginna ko ‘The Westin Chosun Hotel’ ka kɛɲɛ ni Westin Hotels ye Ameriki (bi a ye Starwood Hotels & Resorts ka tɔnden ye).

Ka fara o kan, san 1978, a farala ɲɔgɔn kan ni lotɛli cɛɲi dɔ ye min dabɔra Haeundae, Busan, ani lotɛli min bɛ Busan, o tɔgɔ jiginna ko ‘The Westin Chosun Hotel Busan’ ani lotɛli min bɛ Seoul, o tɔgɔ jiginna ko ‘The Westin Chosun Hotel Seoul’. San 1995, Shinsegae Group ye Westin ka bolofara ta pewu, wa sisan a bɛ Westin tɔgɔ dɔrɔn de fɔ. Sisan, Westin ye taamasiyɛn ye min bɛ Marriott Group ka bolo kan, diɲɛ lotɛli cakɛda kulu dɔ ni Sheraton.

title: Isbank ka bɔ Türkiye
text: Türkiye İş Bankası A.Ş., walima İşbank ni a surunyalen don, o ye banki kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen ye min bɛ feerelikɛlaw ni jago banki baara kɛ Turki jamana na. A sigira senkan san 1924 Mustafa Kemal Atatürk ka yamaruya fɛ, İşbank tun ye jamana banki fɔlɔ ye repibiliki waati la. A ka nafolo hakɛ sera TL miliyari 926,6 ma san 2021, banki in ye banki 181nan ye diɲɛ kɔnɔ waribonba siratigɛ la, ka kɛɲɛ ni jatebɔ ye min laseli kɛra The Banker gafe fɛ. San 2021 desanburukalo la, İşbank bolofara 1195 bɛ yen, 21 bɛ jamana kɔkan, ATM 6476 ani baarakɛla ba 22 ni kɔ.Ka fara o kan, İşbank AG bɛ Alimanjamana na ani İşbank Georgia A.Ş. ani İşbank A.Ş. min bɛ Irisi jamana na. A ka tɔnden ba b'a bolo.

title: Salpazari ye
text:
Şalpazarı, min tun bɛ wele fɔlɔ ko Ağasar, ye Trabzon mara ye. A ni Trabzon cɛ ye bam 69 ye. Kɔgɔji Dugulen mara la Ottoman Mansamara ka mara kɔnɔ, a tun bɛ Görele mara la, min tun bɛ Trabzon la o waati la, nka san 1798 a tun bɛ Vakfıkebir mara la. A ka mɔgɔw yɔrɔ min nafa ka bon kosɛbɛ o ye Turkmen/Chepni ye.

harita2Şalpazarı
Koordinat

title: Silvan ye
text: Silvan ye Diyarbakır mara dɔ ye, min bɛ Anatolia Saheli-Kɔrɔn mara la. O mara in mɔgɔ hakɛ ye 87.639 ye. Silvan kaburu, Malabadi pont, Hasuni kuluba dugu, Selahaddin-i Eyyubi misiri, Zembilfroş Bastion, Eyyubi Kot Minaret, Behlül Bey misiri, Kaldew ka Egilisi kɔrɔ (Municipal Mosque), mise ani tariku sobaw ani Bosat Castle bɛ nin mara in kɔnɔ.

title: Kilavuzlu, Suleymanpasa
text:
Kilavuzlu ye sigida ye Süleymanpasa mara la Tekirdag mara la.

O sigida min tùn ye dugu ye fɔlɔ, o tɔgɔ kelen in tùn bɛ yen kabini 1928 sàn. Mɔgɔ min ye dugu in Sìgi o ye Abdal Ahmet ye, min Bɔra Yenişar dugu la Bulgari jamana na. O sigida ni Tekirdağ dugu cɛmancɛ cɛ ye bam 10 ye.

title: Asian drag champion
text:
Asian Drag Champions  ye drag racing tulon ye min bɛ bolicogo nisɔndiyalen ni wale caman di diɲɛ kɔnɔ min bɛ wele ko virtuel. Tulon in dabɔra baarakɛlaw ka kulu dɔ fɛ min y’u yɛrɛ di, o kɛra fɛnba ye boli teliya ni ɲɔgɔndan juguw kanubagaw cɛma.

Tulonkɛcogo min bɛ mɔgɔ nisɔndiya 
Asian Drag Champions APK kɔnɔ, tulonkɛlaw welelen don ka drag bolicogo lakika sɔrɔ. Mobili suguya caman b’u bolo, k’a ta farikoloɲɛnajɛ mɔbiliw la ka taa a bila motow la, wa u bɛ se k’a fan bɛɛ kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni u yɛrɛ sago ye. Boloci sira gɛlɛn suguya caman ani boli gɛlɛya nisɔndiyalenw bɛ dɔ fara tulon kɛcogo kelen-kelen bɛɛ kan.

Yɛlɛmacogo nafamaw 
"Asian Drag Champions APK" taamasiyɛn dɔ ye fɛn caman sɛmɛntiyacogo ye min bɛ tulon in kɛ cogo kura la. Nin tulon in cogoya sɛmɛntiyalen in b’a to tulonkɛlaw bɛ se ka fɛn wɛrɛw sɔrɔ, i n’a fɔ wari dan tɛ minnu na, ka bolifɛnw ni minɛnw san. O bɛ hɔrɔnya Di u ma ka tulonkɛcogo Labɛn ka Kɛɲɛ ni mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ka fɛtaw ye.

Sigida ɲɛnama 
"Asian Drag Champions APK" sera ka sigida ɲɛnama dɔ sigi senkan, ntolatannaw bɛ se ka jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ yɔrɔ min na, k'u ka ko kɛlenw, u ka fɛɛrɛw ani fɛn caman sɛmɛntiya. Forobaciyɛnw ni sigida-la-jɛkuluw ye yɔrɔ ye ntolatanna jɛkulu bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ yɔrɔ min na, ka kɛnɛ dɔ dabɔ walasa kanubagaw ka jɛ-ka-baara kɛ tulonkɛ diɲɛ kɔnɔ.

Yiriwali min bɛ taa ɲɛ 
"Asian Drag Champions APK" yiriwali jɛkulu bɛ ka fɛn kuraw ni kunnafoni kuraw di kosɛbɛ walasa tulon in ka to kɛnɛ kan. Yecogo ɲɛtaa, mobili suguyaw farali, ani fɛn kura minnu bɛ kɛ tuma bɛɛ, olu ye dalilu ye min b’a jira ko ekipu in cɛsirilen don ka ko kɛlen ɲuman di ntolatannaw ma.

Kuncɛli 
O bɛɛ lajɛlen, "Asian Drag Champions APK" bɛ na ni drag racing sensation dazzling ye ani daɲɛw caman caman cili. Ni tulonkɛcogo dumanw ye, fɛn caman sɛmɛntiyacogo minnu bɛ mɔgɔ wele ani sigida min ka di, tulon in bɛ kɛ sababu ye ka bolifɛnw kanubagaw ni tulonkɛ kanubagaw bɛɛ su ji la. Diɲɛ lakika kɔnɔ, ntolatannaw bɛ boli nisɔndiya sɔrɔ i n'a fɔ u bɛ sira lakika kan, wa o bɛɛ bɛ kɛ "Asian Drag Champions APK" kɔnɔ.

title: Europe
text:
Europe bụ kọntinent nke dị na Northern Hemisphere na nke kachasị na Eastern Hemisphere. Ókèala Europe dị n’ebe ọdịda anyanwụ ọkara nke ebe ugwu, nke dị n’Oké Osimiri Arctic nke dị n’ebe ugwu, ruo n’Oké Osimiri Mediterenian n’ebe ndịda. N'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, ọ rutere n'Oké Osimiri Atlantic. N'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ, ọ dị n'ókè Eshia, ebe ugwu Ural, Osimiri Ural, Oké Osimiri Caspian, ugwu Caucasus, Oké Osimiri Ojii na Bosphorus na Dardanelles.2 Europe bụ otu n'ime kọntinent ndị mejupụtara ya. Eurasia supercontinent, nke dị n'etiti myirịta 35º 30' na 70º 30' ugwu latitude.3

Europe bụ kọntinent nke abụọ kacha nta n'ihe gbasara mpaghara. Ọ na-ekpuchi 10,530,751 km² ma ọ bụ 2% nke elu ụwa yana ihe dịka 6.8% nke mkpokọta ala. Ọ bụ ebe obibi nke ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke mba ndị nwe obodo, naanị ihe karịrị 50, ọnụ ọgụgụ ya na-adabere na nkọwa nke ókèala Europe, yana mwepụ ma ọ bụ nsonye nke steeti ndị a ma ama.

title: Akụkọ ịhụnanya (abụ Taylor Swift)
text:
" Akụkọ ịhụnanya" bụ abụ nke onye ọbụ abụ America bụ Taylor Swift. Ewepụtara ya dị ka onye ndu otu sitere na album studio nke abụọ ya, Fearless, na Septemba 15, 2008, nke Big Machine Records dere. N'ịbụ onye sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nwa nwoke nke ndị ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya na-adịghị amasị ya, Swift dere egwu ahụ site na iji ọdachi William Shakespeare Romeo na Juliet dị ka ihe ntụnye aka. Egwu ndị ahụ na-akọ akụkọ ịhụnanya na-enye nsogbu nke na-ejedebe na atụmatụ alụmdi na nwunye, megidere nkwubi okwu dị egwu Shakespeare. N'ịbụ nke Swift na Nathan Chapman mepụtara, egwu egwu obodo midtempo gụnyere mgbanwe dị mkpa mgbe akwa mmiri gachara ma jiri ngwa egwu gụnyere banjo, fiddle, mandolin, na guitar.

N'oge ewepụtara egwu ahụ, ndị nkatọ egwu toro mmepụta ahụ mana ha chere na ntụnyere ederede adịghị arụ ọrụ. N'ileghachi anya azụ, ndị nkatọ ewerela ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị Swift kacha mma. "Akụkọ ịhụnanya" gbagoro n'elu chaatị ahụ dị na Australia, bụ ebe ndị otu Australian Recording Industry Association (ARIA) kwadoro ya platinum ugboro iri, wee ruo na ise kachasị elu na chaatị dị na Canada, Ireland, Japan, New Zealand, Scotland, na UK. Na U.S., otu ahụ nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ anọ na Billboard Hot 100 ma bụrụ abụ obodo mbụ ruru nọmba nke mbụ na Mainstream Top 40. Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Ndị Ọrụ Na-edekọ Ihe nke America (RIAA) kwadoro ya platinum ugboro asatọ. " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" erela ihe karịrị nde isii na US na nde 18 n'ụwa niile.

Trey Fanjoy duziri vidiyo egwu na-eso ya, nke kpakpando Swift na Justin Gaston dị ka ndị hụrụ n'anya n'oge gara aga. N'ịbụ ndị sitere na oge akụkọ ihe mere eme dị ka Renaissance na oge Regency, ọ meriri Video nke Afọ na ma National Music Association Awards na CMT Music Awards na 2009. Egwu ahụ ghọrọ ihe dị mkpa na ihe nkiri ndụ Swift ma bụrụ akụkụ nke setịpụ. depụtara na njem nlegharị anya isi ya niile site na njem nlegharị anya enweghị atụ (2009–2010) gaa na njem Eras (2023). N'ịgbaso esemokwu 2019 gbasara ikike nke Swift's back katalọgụ, ọ degharịrị egwu ahụ wee wepụta ya dịka " Akụkọ ịhụnanya (Taylor's Version)" na February 2021. Otu edekọghachiri dekọrọ tolitere chaatị egwu Country Hot wee mee Swift nke abụọ. onye na-ese ihe mgbe Dolly Parton ga-eru nọmba nke mbụ na ụdị egwu mbụ na nke edegharịrị. O rukwara nke mbụ na Malaysia.

ndabere na ide

Onye ọbụ abụ America bụ Taylor Swift si na Pennsylvania kwaga Nashville, Tennessee na 2004 ịchụso ọrụ dị ka onye na-egwu egwu obodo, [2] na na 2006, o wepụtara album mbụ akpọrọ onwe ya na 16 afọ.[3] Album ahụ nọrọ ọtụtụ izu na chaatị US Billboard 200 karịa ọba ọ bụla ọzọ ewepụtara n'ime afọ iri nke 2000.[4] Abụ nke atọ Taylor Swift mere Swift ka ọ bụrụ onye ọdụdụ ka o jiri aka ya dee na na-abụ abụ Hot Country nọmba-otu otu.[5] Ihe ịga nke ọma ya dị ụkọ maka nwanyị na-ese ihe n'afọ iri na ụma; ahịa egwu obodo nke afọ 2000 bụ ndị nwoke toro eto na-egwu egwu.[6][7]

Ka ọ na-akwalite ọba mpụta mbụ ya na njem nlegharị anya na 2007 na 2008, Swift dere abụ maka album studio nke abụọ ya enweghị atụ.[8] Ọ malitere "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na mmepụta nke enweghị atụ.[9] N'ịza ajụjụ ndị fan n'oge n'April 2009, Swift kwuru na egwu a sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site n'aka nwa nwoke ọ na-akpatụbeghị na ọ bụ otu n'ime ibe ịhụnanya kachasị mma o dere.[10] Swift chetara mmeghachi omume ọ nwetara mgbe ọ kọwachara ya na ndị ezinụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya: "[Ha niile] kwuru na ha enweghị mmasị na ya. Ha niile! -Egwuregwu Romeo na Juliet nke narị afọ, nke ọ kọwara dị ka "ọnọdụ ebe naanị ndị chọrọ ka ha nọrọ ọnụ bụ ha."[11] N'ịtụgharị uche na ihe omume ahụ, Swift chere, "Nke a siri ike ma ọ bụ n'ezie, ọ dị mkpa"; o mepụtara nkwubi okwu nke abụọ wee mechaa egwu ahụ dum gburugburu ahịrị ahụ.[13]

Ọ bụ ezie na Romeo na Juliet sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ, Swift chere na egwuregwu ahụ nwere ike ịbụ "akụkọ ịhụnanya kachasị mma a kọtụrụla" ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị maka njedebe dị egwu Shakespeare bụ nke ndị odide abụọ ahụ na-anwụ.[14]. O si otú a jiri atụmatụ alụmdi na nwunye mechie akụkọ nke "Akụkọ ịhụnanya" nke o chere na ọ bụ njedebe obi ụtọ na ndị odide kwesịrị ekwesị.[14][15] Swift dere " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" n'ala ụlọ ime ụlọ ya n'ime ihe dịka nkeji iri abụọ, na-enwe mmetụta nke ukwuu itinye egwu ahụ n'emecha.[11] Dị ka Swift si kwuo, egwu a na-anọchite anya nchekwube o nwere n'ịhụnanya, nke sitere na mmasị nwata ya na akụkọ ifo sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ.[15] N'ileghachi anya azụ na "Akụkọ ịhụnanya" ka ọ tọhapụrụ album studio nke asaa ya Lover (2019), nke bụ maka ahụmịhe mbụ ya nke "ịhụnanya nke dị adị n'ezie", Swift kwuru na egwu ahụ bụ "ihe m hụrụ na ihe nkiri [na] Agụrụ m agwakọta na ụfọdụ ihe ndị mere na ndụ m.”[16]

Mmepụta na ntọhapụ

Mgbe o dechara ederede, Swift dekọtara ngosi siri ike nke " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" n'ime nkeji iri na ise n'echi ya.[10] O dekọtara ụdị ọba egwu a na Maachị 2008 ya na onye nrụpụta Nathan Chapman na Blackbird Studios na Nashville.[17] Maka ụda olu ya, Chapman nwara igwe okwu dị iche iche ruo mgbe Swift nwetara igwe okwu Avantone CV-12 nke ọtụtụ onye na-egwu egwu obodo Ray Kennedy wuru, onye ya na ya rụkọrọ ọrụ na Taylor Swift. Mgbe ọ nwesịrị mmasị na Avantone CV-12 mgbe ọ nwalere ụda olu ya, Swift jiri ya dekọọ " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" na egwu ndị ọzọ. Ọ bụrụ abụ ahụ na-ebi ndụ na-akwado ndị otu ya, bụ ndị na-akụ ụbọ akwara, guitar bass, na drum. Chapman na-egwuri egwu ndị ọzọ, gụnyere ụbọ akwara iteghete, o wee kụchie ha na egwu; o dekọkwara ụda olu dị n'azụ.[17]

Onye injinia ndekọ Chad Carlson dekọtara egwu ahụ site na iji Pro Tools na Justin Niebank jikọtara ya site na iji usoro Solid State Logic 9080 K na consoles Genelec 1032.[17] Drew Bollman na Richard Edgeler nyere aka n'usoro agwakọta.[18] "Akụkọ ịhụnanya", ya na ndị ọzọ nke enweghị atụ, bụ Hank Williams nwetara na MasterMix Studios na Nashville.[18] Egwu a na-eji ngwa egwu obodo dị ka banjo na fiddle. Big Machine Records weputara ya na redio obodo US dị ka onye ndu Fearless na Septemba 15, 2008.[17][19] Chapman jikọtara ụdị ọzọ nke " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" maka redio pop; o ji Apple Logic dezie ngwakọta Nielbank ma mebie ngwa egwu dị ka banjo na fiddle.[17] Ụdị mmapụta redio nwere mmeghe oghere nke emere site na iji Apple Logic's Ultrabeat, ma jiri Amplitube Stomp I/O kee gita eletrik.[17] Rolling Stone's Keith Harris kọwara gita eletrik dị ka "gargantuan dabara adaba" ma na-ada ụda karịa nke dị na ụdị redio obodo.[20] Big Machine na mmekorita ya na Republic Records weputara "Love Story" na redio pop US na Ọktoba 14, 2008.[21]

Egwu na egwu egwu

"Akụkọ ịhụnanya" bụ egwu egwu obodo midtempo [22][23] nke ngwa egwu egwu gụnyere banjo, fiddle, mandolin na guitar na-ebugharị.[24] Onye nkatọ Jon Bream sitere na Star Tribune kọwara otu dị ka "popu dị ọcha nwere obere vibe" dabara ma obodo ma redio pop.[22] Dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ The New York Times si kwuo, n'agbanyeghị banjo na fiddle, egwu a nwere ike "dị mfe ịbụ emo rocker".[25] Ụda olu Swift nwere ntakịrị twang.[26] Ngwakọta na nna ukwu, dị ka Billboard's Kristen He siri kwuo, na-ada ụda na "dị larịị dị larịị… [ma] emebere ya ka ọ dapụ na ndị na-ekwu redio FM".[24]
 
 Egwu nke "Akụkọ ịhụnanya" na-akọ akụkọ ịhụnanya dị mgbagwoju anya n'etiti agwa abụọ, na-esite na ndị isi agwa na Shakespeare's Romeo na Juliet.[27] Dị ka ọkà n'akparamàgwà mmadụ Katie Barclay si kwuo, abụ ahụ na-enyocha mmetụta ịhụnanya n'ihe mgbu na ọṅụ.[28] "Akụkọ ịhụnanya", chekwa maka nkwụsị ikpeazụ, ka akọpụtara site n'echiche Juliet.[1][29] N'amaokwu ndị a, Juliet na-akọ akụkọ banyere nke ya na Romeo na-ama aka ịlụ, nke nna ya anabataghị ya.[30] Amaokwu mbụ na-ewebata Juliet na a idaha, "Anyị abụọ bụ ndị na-eto eto mgbe mbụ m hụrụ gị / m na-emechi anya m na flashback amalite, m na-eguzo n'ebe ahụ / Na mbara ihu na okpomọkụ ikuku", nke na-ezo aka mbara ihu na Act. II, ọnọdụ ii nke egwuregwu Shakespeare.[1] N'okwu a, nke na-agbanwe ntakịrị ka egwu ahụ na-aga n'ihu na-eso akụkọ ahụ, Juliet rịọrọ ka mmasị ịhụnanya ya pụta, "Romeo, kpọga m ebe anyị nwere ike ịnọ naanị m / m ga-echere / ihe niile fọdụrụnụ ime bụ ịgba ọsọ. [28] [29]
N'amaokwu nke abụọ, Juliet zutere Romeo ọzọ n'ime ubi ma mụta na ọ ga-ahapụrịrị obodo n'ihi nnabata nna ya.[10] Mmekọrịta ha na-ezute ihe isi ike, "'N'ihi na ị bụ Romeo, abụ m akwụkwọ ozi na-acha uhie uhie", na-ezo aka na Nathaniel Hawthorne's The Scarlet Letter (1850).[31][32] Dị ka ọkà mmụta mgbasa ozi na ihe nkiri Iris H. Tuan si kwuo, ihe oyiyi "akwụkwọ ozi na-acha uhie uhie" nke Hawthrone na-anọchi anya mmehie na ịkwa iko nwanyị bụ Hester Prynne, ebe ojiji Swift na-egosipụta ịhụnanya a machibidoro iwu n'etiti Romeo na Juliet.[31] Juliet na-arịọ, sị, "Ịhụnanya a siri ike, mana ọ dị adị", nke Swift kwuru na ọ bụ egwu kachasị amasị ya na egwu ahụ.[33]

Mgbe àkwà mmiri ahụ gachara, ya na mkpọsa ngwa ngwa na nkwekọ nke abụ na ụda olu, nkwụsị ikpeazụ na-agụnye mgbanwe dị mkpa na usoro dum.[34] A na-akọwa nkwubi okwu ikpeazụ site n'echiche Romeo wee na-akọ banyere atụmatụ alụmdi na nwunye ya na Juliet mgbe ọ chọsịrị nkwenye nna ya, "Agwara m papa gị okwu, gaa họrọ uwe ọcha." [35] Ebe Shakespeare's Romeo na Juliet lụrụ na nzuzo. na-enweghị nkwado nke ndị mụrụ ha ma na-egbu onwe ha, ndị odide na "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" na-apụ na njedebe ahụ.[36] Dị ka Tuan si kwuo, site n'ịkọpụta mmetụta ya na echiche efu ya na akụkọ Romeo na Juliet sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ, Swift kere abụ nke na-emetụta ndị na-ege ntị nke ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ agbọghọ.[37] Onye nta akụkọ bụ Deborah Evans Price nke Billboard kwetara ma kwuokwa na "mmadụ ekwesịghị ịbụ onye na-eto eto ịhụnanya" iji nwee mmasị na njikọ mmetụta uche nke egwu ahụ.[38]

Nnabata dị mkpa

Blender gụnyere " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" na nọmba 73 na ndepụta njedebe afọ 2008, [39] na ntuli aka The Village Voice's Pazz & Jop critics' debere ya na nọmba 48.[40] Na nyocha enweghị atụ, ọtụtụ ndị nkatọ toro mmepụta ahụ; Sean Daly sitere na St. Petersburg Times, [41] Rob Sheffield si Blender[42] na Stephen Thomas Erlewine sitere na AllMusic họpụtara egwu ahụ dị ka ihe ngosi ọba.[43] Deborah Evans Price nke Billboard toro mmepụta "swirling, dreamy" ma kwuo na Swift nwere ọganihu n'ahịa egwu obodo "nwere ike nweta ume naanị".[38] Ndị ọzọ gụnyere The Boston Globe's James Reed[29] na USA Today's Elysa Gardner lere " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" dịka ọmụmaatụ nke ikike ide abụ Swift mgbe ọ dị obere; Nke ikpeazụ nwere ekele maka abụ ahụ maka ịkọwa mmetụta nke afọ iri na ụma "kama [ịbụ] onye na-ekwuchitere ọnụ maka ụyọkọ echiche mkpokọta ndị agadi na-achọsi ike n'oge uto".[44]

Ụfọdụ ndị nkatọ na-edobe anya karịa n'otuto ha ma na-ese okwu na ntụaka akwụkwọ. Na ọkwa anọ nke kpakpando anọ nke abụ maka BBC, Fraser McAlpine weere na Shakespearean na-ekwu na ọ bụghị dị ka ọkaibe dị ka ụlọ ya na egwu egwu, ma ọ toro mmepụta ahụ wee dee, "Ọ dị mma ịhụ a. nnukwu egwu egwu a na-eji dị ka usoro nke ịkọ akụkọ kpọmkwem."[27] Ọkà mmụta egwu bụ James E. Perone kwuru, sị: "Mkpọ ụda olu ụtọ siri ike nke ukwuu iji merie amụma nke egwu egwu."[45] Jon Bream sitere na Star Tribune chere otu dị ala karịa Swift si mpụta mbụ-egwu otu "Tim McGraw" (2006) mana jara mmepụta ahụ dị ka ihe na-adọrọ adọrọ.[22] Na nyocha Slant Magazine, Jonathan Keefe masịrị ya site n'ịde abụ olu ụtọ nke Swift maka ịmepụta "oke pop hooks" mana ọ chọtara ntụaka na Romeo na Juliet "na-efu efu" na Akwụkwọ Ozi Scarlet "enweghị nkọwa". Keefe chere na egwu ndị ahụ enweghị ike imepụta ihe na anabataghị nkebiokwu nke Swift na nkwubi okwu ahụ.[46]Na ntụleghachi azụ azụ, prọfesọ n'asụsụ Bekee Robert N. Watson lere anya na "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" na-egosi ọkwa Swift dị ka "onye na-ede abụ kachasị ewu ewu nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ na mbụ nke ihe omume ịhụnanya dara ada", kpọmkwem n'ihi akụkọ Shakespearean.[47] Ndị nkatọ egosila "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" dị elu na ọkwa nke egwu Swift; Ndị a gụnyere Hannah Mylrea sitere na NME (2020), onye họọrọ ya nke ise n'ime egwu 160, [48] Jane Song sitere na Paste (2020), 13th n'ime 158, [49] na Nate Jones sitere na Vulture (2021), onye họọrọ ya. nke itoolu n'ime 179.[50] N'ọkwa ọzọ nke Swift họrọ egwu 100 maka The Independent, Roisin O'Connor debere " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" na nọmba 15 wee kwuo na ọ na-egosi Swift dị ka onye na-ede abụ bụ onye "ghọtara ike nke ịhụnanya amachibidoro".[51] Alexis Petridis sitere na The Guardian debere ya nke abụọ, n'azụ "Oghere oghere" (2014), na ọkwa 2019 nke Swift's 44 singles. O kwuru banyere akwụkwọ edemede ndị ahụ: "[Ọ bụrụ na] ntụaka nke Shakespeare na Hawthorn dị ka ihe na-adịghị mma, ha na-ada ụda n'ụzọ dị afọ iri na ụma." (2016), [53] Oge Out's 35 Best Country Songs of All Time (2022), [54] na Billboard's Top 50 Country Love Songs of All Time (2022).

Ịrụ ọrụ azụmahịa

Na US, "Akụkọ ịhụnanya" arụpụtara na nọmba 16 na Billboard Hot 100 yana nọmba 25 na chaatị Mba Hot Country, ha abụọ dị na Septemba 27, 2008.[55][56] N'izu na-abịa, ọ ruru nọmba ise na Hot 100.[57] Otu ahụ gbagoro na ọnụọgụ anọ na eserese Hot 100 nke dị na Jenụwarị 17, 2009, wee nọrọ izu 49 na eserese ahụ.[58] Ọ nọrọ izu abụọ n'elu chaatị egwu obodo na-ekpo ọkụ.[59] Na eserese Mainstream Top 40 (Pop Songs), nke na-agbaso redio pop US, " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" ruru nọmba nke mbụ n'izu na-agwụ na February 28, 2009.[60] Ọ ghọrọ abụ mbụ n'elu ma redio redio na redio redio wee karịa ọnụọgụ atọ-peaking "You're Still The One" (1998) site na Shania Twain dị ka mba kachasị elu na-agafe na redio pop. [61]

Na chaatị ụgbọ elu Billboard ndị ọzọ, "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" gbagoro na nke mbụ na Ndị okenye Contemporary yana ọnụọgụ atọ na egwu ndị okenye.[62][63] Yana "Teardrops on My Guitar" (2007), "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" mere Swift onye mbụ na-ese ihe na 2000 afọ iri na-enwe aha abụọ nke ọ bụla ruru 10 n'elu nke anọ airplay chaatị; Egwu obodo na-ekpo ọkụ, isi iri anọ kacha elu, egwu ndị okenye na ndị okenye nke oge a.[64] Ọ nọ n'elu chaatị egwu redio ngwụcha afọ 2009.[65] Ka ọ na-erule February 2009, ebe e rere nde nbudata, ọ bụ otu obodo kacha ere mgbe niile.[66] N'afọ 2015, Associationlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ndị Na-edekọ Ihe nke America (RIAA) kwadoro " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" platinum ugboro asatọ.[67] Otu ahụ erela nde 6.2 na US ka ọ na-erule Ọktoba 2022 wee bụrụ otu kacha ere Swift na mba ahụ.[68]

"Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" bụ Swift mbụ nọmba-otu na Australia, [69] ebe e nwetara ya platinum ugboro iri.[70] Ọ gbagoro n'ime eserese ise kachasị elu na Japan (atọ), [71] na ụwa ndị na-asụ Bekee sara mbara: UK (abụọ), [72] Ireland (atọ), [73] New Zealand (atọ), 74] Canada (anọ), [75] na Scotland (ise).[76] Na ala Europe, otu ahụ ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ iri na chaatị European Hot 100 Singles, [77] nọmba anọ na Czech Republic, [78] nọmba isii na Hungary, [79] nọmba asaa na Norway, [80] na iri iri. na Sweden.[81] "Akụkọ ịhụnanya" enwetara ikike platinum atọ na UK,[82] platinum okpukpu abụọ na Canada,[83] platinum na Denmark, Germany na New Zealand, [84] [85] [86] na ọla edo na Italy na Japan. 87] Ọ rere nde 6.5 dijitalụ n'ụwa niile ma bụrụ otu nke isii kachasị ebudatara na 2009.[88] Ka ọ na-erule ọnwa Febụwarị 2021, e mere atụmatụ ire "akụkọ ịhụnanya" n'ụwa niile guzoro na nkeji 18.[89]

Vidiyo egwu

Trey Fanjoy, onye ya na Swift rụkọrọ ọrụ na vidiyo egwu gara aga, duziri " Akụkọ ịhụnanya".[90] Swift sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site n'oge akụkọ ihe mere eme dị ka Middle Ages, Renaissance, na Regency iji mee vidiyo nke nwere oge nwere akụkọ na-enweghị oge nke "nwere ike ime na 1700s, 1800s, ma ọ bụ 2008".[90] Ọ nọrọ ọnwa isii na-achọ onye ndu nwoke na ndụmọdụ onye ọ maara họọrọ Justin Gaston, ihe nlere ejiji nke na-asọ mpi na usoro telivishọn Nashville Star.[91][92] Mgbe e kpochapụrụ Gaston na ihe nkiri ahụ, Swift kpọtụụrụ ya ka ọ pụta na vidiyo ahụ.[90] O kwenyere na Gaston bụ nhọrọ zuru oke maka onye ndu nwoke: "Otú [okwu ya] si dị na vidio ahụ masịrị m nke ukwuu. N'enweghị ọbụna ikwu ihe ọ bụla, ọ ga-eme ntakịrị anya na ọ ga-agafe nke ọma." 91]

Esere vidiyo egwu n'ime ụbọchị abụọ n'August 2008 na Tennessee. Ndị ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ tụlere ịga Europe ịchọta nnukwu ụlọ maka nhazi vidiyo mana ha biri na Castle Gwynn na Arlington; Ewubere nnukwu ụlọ ahụ na 1973 ma bụrụ akụkụ nke mmemme Renaissance Tennessee kwa afọ.[90] Wardrobe maka vidiyo—ewezuga uwe Swift maka ebe mbara ihu, nke Sandi Spika mere site na mkpali na aro sitere na Swift—bụ Jacquard Fabrics wetara ya.[90] N'ụbọchị mbụ, a na-ese foto na mbara ihu na mbara ala. Ihe onyonyo nke ụbọchị nke abụọ gụnyere ihe nkiri bọọlụ a na-esere ya na ndị na-agba egwu 20 sitere na Mahadum Cumberland na Lebanon; Swift mụtara choreography nkeji iri na ise tupu emee ihe onyonyo.[90] Ọ kpọrọ ụfọdụ ndị Fans bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ mahadum si na steeti ndị ọzọ ka ha fega Nashville wee soro ya mee ihe nkiri ahụ.[93] " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" ewepụtara na Septemba 12, 2008, na CMT.[94] Egosara ihe nkiri n'azụ ihe nkiri vidiyo egwu a na Mba America na Nọvemba 12, 2008.[95]Vidio na-amalite na Swift yi uwe ojii na jeans; ọ na-aga n'ụlọ akwụkwọ kọleji wee hụ Gaston ka ọ na-agụ n'okpuru osisi. Ka ha na-ele anya, vidiyo na-aga na mbara ihu, nke Swift na-eyi corset na uwe elu. Vidio ahụ na-agbanye n'ime ụlọ ịgba egwu ebe Gaston na Swift na-agba egwu ọnụ, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị Gaston na-atụgharị na ntị Swift. A na-egosi Swift ọzọ ka ọ na-aga n'ogige nwere oriọna n'abalị. Ọ na-ezute Gaston na ha nwere ụbọchị tupu ha kewapụ ụzọ. Mgbe e mesịrị, Swift guzoro ọzọ na mbara ihu na-elepụ anya na windo. Ọ na-ahụ Gaston ka ọ na-agba ọsọ n'ọhịa chere ya ihu, ọ gbadara n'elu steepụ ozugbo izute ya. Vidio ahụ wee laghachi azụ n'ogige mahadum nke oge a, ebe Gaston na-aga na Swift wee legide anya n'anya ibe ha, vidiyo ahụ agwụ.[90]

Spin kwuru na vidiyo a na-egosi na a na-esere ya na "mmefu ego na-achọ HBO" nke nwere "ọtụtụ, pseudo-medieval set iberibe"; dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ si kwuo, kama ịkọwa Shakespeare's Romeo na Juliet, akụkọ ahụ yiri "Rapunzel", karịsịa akụkụ nke àgwà Swift na-echere onye hụrụ ya n'anya n'elu nnukwu ụlọ.[96]. Dị ka Glamour si kwuo, ejiji Swift dị na vidiyo ahụ na-emesi isiokwu egwu ahụ ike, "[Ọ] na-eyiri uwe ejiji oge ochie mgbe ọ na-egwu Juliet na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Romeo." ọnọdụ agbamakwụkwọ nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ: "Abụghị m nwa agbọghọ ahụ nke na-arọ nrọ banyere ụbọchị agbamakwụkwọ ya.

Ihe nrite na nhọpụta

"Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" meriri Song of the Year na Country Awards na 2009 na Pop Awards na 2010, nke abụọ bụ nke Broadcast Music, Inc. (BMI) nwere maka ịsọpụrụ egwu kachasị egwu nke afọ na redio na telivishọn US. 99] Ọ bụ akara mmeri nke abụọ nke Swift n'usoro nke abụ nke afọ na BMI Country Awards, na-esote "Teardrops on My Guitar" na 2008.[100] Swift, onye dị afọ 20, bụ ọdụdụ onye dere abụ meriri n'abụ nke afọ na BMI Pop Awards.[101] Na Australian APRA Awards, "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" ka a họpụtara maka Ọrụ Mba Nile nke Afọ.[102]

Ọ natara nhọpụta na Nhọrọ Ndị mmadụ (abụ mba ọkacha mmasị, nke gara Carrie Underwood's "Aha Ikpeazụ"),[103] Nickelodeon Australian Kids' Choice Awards (abụ ọkacha mmasị, nke gara na Black Eyed Peas'"Boom Boom Pow" ), [104] na Teen Choice Awards ( Choice Love Song, nke gara David Archuleta's "Crush").[105][106] A họpụtara vidiyo egwu maka Video nke Afọ na 45th Academy of Country Music Awards, mana ọ tụfuru Brad Paisley's "Waitin' on a Woman" (2008).[107][108] Na 2009 CMT Music Awards, ọ meriri Vidiyo nke Afọ na Vidio nwanyị nke afọ.[109] Ọ nwetakwara vidiyo egwu nke afọ na 43rd Country Music Association Awards[110] na Favorite International Video na Philippine Myx Music Awards 2010.[111]

Ihe ngosi dị ndụ na ojiji ndị ọzọ

"Akụkọ ịhụnanya" abụrụla ihe dị mkpa na ihe nkiri Swift - dịka nke Julaị 2023, o meela egwu ahụ ndụ ihe karịrị ugboro 500.[112] N'oge nkwalite nke enweghị atụ na 2008 na 2009, Swift rụrụ "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" na ihe nkiri telivishọn gụnyere Good Morning America, Late Show with David Letterman, The Today Show, [113] Ịgba egwu na Stars, [114] Ellen DeGeneres Show, 115] na Saturday Night Live.[116] Na 2008 Country Music Association Awards, o megharịrị vidiyo egwu maka "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ", na-eme egwu ahụ na ntọala ụlọ ịgba egwu na Gaston na-egwu mmasị ịhụnanya.[117] Swift na English band Def Leppard rụrụ "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ", n'etiti egwu ndị ọzọ sitere na ihe nkiri onye ọ bụla, maka ihe omume CMT Crossroads nke edere na October 2008; E wepụtara arụmọrụ ahụ na DVD na 2009.[118] Na UK, Swift bụrụ abụ "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" na BBC charity telethon Children in Need, nke o nyere £13,000 ka emechara.[114]

"Akụkọ ịhụnanya" bụ akụkụ nke ndepụta ahaziri maka ọtụtụ mmemme isi akụkọ Swift's 2009, gụnyere Houston Livestock Show na Rodeo, [119] Florida Strawberry Festival, [120] Sound Relief, [121] CMA Music Festival, [122] na Craven Country Jamboree.[123] Ọ tinyere egwu a na ndepụta aha ndepụta nke njem egwu egwu mbụ ya na njem egwu egwu (2009–2010). Ihe ngosi egwu a malitere site na ndị na-agba egwu nkwado ndabere na mpaghara yi uwe ndị Victoria, na-agba egwu na Pachelbel's Canon dịka ebe a na-atụpụta nnukwu ụlọ n'elu ogbo.[124] Swift si n'okpuru pụta ruo ọkwa dị elu nke ogbo; o yi uwe mwụda crimson nke narị afọ nke 18 nwere ụda ọla edo.[125] Maka nkwụsị ikpeazụ, Swift zoro n'azụ ndị na-agba egwu ndabere ka ọ na-agbanwe ka ọ bụrụ uwe agbamakwụkwọ na-acha ọcha na akwa isi ọla.[126][127] Edekọrọ ihe ngosi nke "Ịhụnanya" ma wepụta ya na njem DVD na-atụghị egwu na 2011.[128]

"Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" bụ abụ ikpeazụ na ndepụta ndepụta nke njem isi okwu nke abụọ nke Swift, Speak Now World Tour (2011-2012).[129] Swift yi uwe akwa na-acha ọcha wee bụrụ abụ ahụ ka ọ na-agagharị n'ogbo ahụ na mbara ihu na-efe efe ka confetti na-ezo na ọkụ na-agbawa na ogbo.[130] Egwu a bụ akụkụ nke arụmọrụ Swift na BBC Radio 1's Teen Awards na Ọktoba 2012; ọ pụtara na uwe na-acha ọcha tupu ọ gbanwee ghọọ uwe ogologo ọkpa na-ekpo ọkụ ọlaọcha na elu ojii.[131] Swift bụrụ abụ ahụ ka e mesịrị n'otu ọnwa ahụ dịka akụkụ nke ihe omume VH1 Storytellers nke e dekọrọ na Harvey Mudd College na California.[132] Na Jenụwarị 25, 2013, Swift mere ụdị egwu egwu nke " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" na Los Premios 40 Principales na Spain.[133] Ọ gụnyekwara egwu ahụ ọzọ na ndepụta nke njem nlegharị anya isi akụkọ nke atọ ya Red Tour (2013–2014), bụ ebe ọ gụrụ ya mgbe ọ yi uwe ọcha.[134]
 
 Na 2014 iHeartRadio Music Awards, Swift rụrụ ụdị egwu egwu egwuregwu nke " Akụkọ ịhụnanya".[135] N'oge ihe nkiri nke njem nlegharị anya akụkọ nke anọ ya na 1989 World Tour (2015), ọ haziri abụ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ synth-pop ballad wee bụrụ ya ka ọ na-eguzo n'elu ikpo okwu dị elu nke na-agba gburugburu ebe mgbakọ ahụ.[136][137] N'ikwu okwu banyere nhazigharị njegharị ụwa nke 1989, Jane Song sitere na Paste kwuru na " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" "ga-aga n'ihu na-abụ otu n'ime kaadị ịkpọ oku [Swift]".[49] Swift gụnyekwara "Akụkọ ịhụnanya" na ndepụta nke njem egwu egwu nke ise ya, njem nlegharị anya ama ama egwuregwu 2018, bụ nke o mere ya dị ka akụkụ nke egwuregwu egwu ya na ndị otu ya "Style" na "Ị bụ Mụ na M"[138].
N'April 23, 2019, ọ rụrụ nsụgharị piano nke " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" na Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts n'oge Oge 100 Gala, bụ nke a na-asọpụrụ ya dị ka otu n'ime "ndị kasị nwee mmetụta" nke afọ.[139] Na Septemba 9, Swift rụrụ egwu a na obodo ndị hụrụ n'anya otu oge na Paris.[140] Na American Music Awards nke 2019, nke e nyere ya "Artist of the Year", Swift rụrụ "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ" dị ka akụkụ nke egwuregwu na "Nwoke ahụ", "Amaara m na ị nwere nsogbu", "Oghere oghere", na "Kwụpụ ya"[141]. Na Julaị 21, 2022, na egwu egwu Haim's One More Haim Tour na London, Swift mere ngosi ọbịa wee mee " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" dịka akụkụ nke mashup na " mmanụ ụgbọala ".[142] Ọ gụnyekwara "Akụkọ ịhụnanya" n'ime ndepụta oge niile nke njem isi akụkọ 2023, Njem Eras.[143]

"Akụkọ ịhụnanya" ka agbanweela ma mee ka ọ bụrụ mmemme omenala ama ama. Maka ihe nrite egwu CMT 2009, Swift na rapper T-Pain dekọtara parody akpọrọ "Thug Story", nke ha na-eji Auto-Tune rap na-abụ abụ; The parody ekesara dị ka akụkụ nke oyi na-atụ ememe nke award emume.[144] N'August 2020, remix ụlọ na-akwadoghị nke " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" sitere na American DJ Disco Lines malitere viral na ikpo okwu nkekọrịta vidiyo TikTok.[145] The Disco Lines remix e debere na nọmba 37 na eserese ikuku Poland na Ọktoba 2020.[146]

" Akụkọ ịhụnanya (ụdị Taylor)"

Mgbe ya na Republic Records bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ, Swift malitere idegharị ọba akwụkwọ akụkọ isii mbụ ya, gụnyere Fearless, na Nọvemba 2020.[192] Mkpebi a bịara mgbe esemokwu ọha na eze 2019 dị n'etiti Swift na onye njikwa talent Scooter Braun, onye nwetara Big Machine Records, gụnyere ndị isi nke ọba Swift nke akara ahụ wepụtara.[193][194] Site na idekọ katalọgụ ya, Swift nwere ikike zuru oke nke ndị nna ukwu ọhụrụ, gụnyere ikike nwebiisinka nke egwu ya, na-eweda nna ukwu Big Machine nwere ọnụ ahịa.[195]

Swift dekọgharịrị " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" wee kpọọ ya " Akụkọ ịhụnanya (ụdị Taylor)". Ejiri akụkụ nke ndekọghachi ya na mgbasa ozi Match.com na Disemba 2020.[196] "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ (Taylor's Version)" bụ egwu nke mbụ edekọgharịrị;[197] e mere ya maka nbudata na nkwanye na February 12, 2021, tupu mwepụta nke album edegharịrị edegharị Egwu (Taylor's Version) na Eprel. [198][199] Ụdị EDM nke "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ (Taylor's Version)" nke onye na-emepụta Swedish Elvira megharịrị ka ewepụtara na Machị 26, 2021 ma tinye ya na mbipụta deluxe nke Fearless (Taylor's Version).[200]

"Ịhụnanya Akụkọ (Taylor's Version)" bụ onye na-emepụta Swift na Nashville bụ Christopher Rowe mepụtara. David Payne dekọtara ya na Blackbird Studios, yana ndekọ ọzọ nke Rowe na Prime Recording na Studio 13, ha niile dị na Nashville. Sam Holland dekọtara ụda olu Swift na Conway Recording Studios na Los Angeles; Serban Ghenea gwakọtara ndekọ na MixStar Studios na Virginia Beach, Virginia; na Randy Merrill mụtara ya na Sterling Sound na Edgewater, New Jersey.[201] Swift kpọrọ ụfọdụ ndị egwu na-arụ ọrụ na ụdị 2008 ka ha na ya dekọọ ọzọ; ndị a so na-agụnye Jonathan Yudkin na fiddle, Amos Heller na bass guitar, na Caitlin Evanson na nkwekọrịta ụda; ha so na ndị otu nlegharị anya nke Swift wee soro ya gwuo egwu "Love Story" ọtụtụ oge.[201]
 
 Dị ka ndị nkatọ si kwuo, mmepụta nke "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ (Taylor's Version)" kwesịrị ntụkwasị obi na nke ụdị 2008.[201][202] Ha hụrụ mgbanwe na timbre nke ụda olu Swift, nke nwere ụda zuru oke yana enweghị ụda egwu obodo; [204] Swift kwuru na idegharịgharị " Akụkọ ịhụnanya" mere ka ọ ghọta ka o siri mee ka ọ bụrụ onye ọbụ abụ na ka "olu ya siri dị afọ iri na ụma" na ndekọ ochie.[205].
 
 Ngwa ndị a na-edegharịgharị na-adị nkọ ma dị iche iche, na-enwe ụda nke banjo, ájà, na fiddle; drọd ike; bass akọwapụtara nke ọma; gita eletrik na-adịchaghị njọ; na wedata nkwekọ na ngwakọta.[24][203][206] Na Billboard, Kristen O kwuru na ngwa ndị dị na ụdị 2008 na-ejikọta na "mgbidi ụda", mmepụta nke " Akụkọ ịhụnanya (Taylor's Version)" na-eme ka ngwá ọrụ dị iche iche pụta ìhè.[24].
Na nyocha, ndị nkatọ toro " Akụkọ ịhụnanya (Taylor's Version)" maka ikwesị ntụkwasị obi na ụdị nke mbụ wee chee na ejiri mmepụta mara mma na ụda olu Swift kwalitere ya.[203][204][207] Mmadụ ole na ole nabatara ndekọgharị ahụ dị ka ngosipụta nke Swift nwe nke egwu ya.[202][206] Nlebanya sitere na Simon Vozick-Levinson nke Rolling Stone na Los Angeles Times's Mikael Wood kpọrọghachi mmelite nke egwu "kpochapụwo" gbasara mmetụta ndị ntorobịa.[202][208] Mark Savage sitere na BBC kwuru na ụda olu dị mma nke Swift na-ejigide mmetụta nke afọ iri na ụma, [203] mana Atlantic's Shirley Li na NME's Hannah Mylrea kwuru na ha dị ike karịa, nke na-ewebata echiche nke amamihe na ya mere na-efunahụ ịdị ọkụ nke ụdị 2008.[204]. [207] Dị ka Robert Christgau si kwuo, "olu Swift na-anọgide na-adị ọhụrụ" mana ọ jụrụ uru idegharị ya nke abụ ndị mbụ, na-ekwu na "enweghị ike iche n'echiche ọbụna na m ga-ewepụta ego maka ndekọghachi. ọ gwụla ma Rob Sheffield mere ka m kwenye."[209]

Na US, "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ (Taylor's Version)" arụpụtara n'elu eserese egwu Mba Hot, na-enye Swift nọmba asatọ ya-otu na mbụ nọmba-otu mpụta mbụ. Site na mmezu a, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese ihe mbụ na-eduzi eserese ahụ na 2000s, 2010s, na 2020s, yana onye na-ese ihe nke abụọ nwere ọnụọgụ nke mbụ nwere ụdị egwu mbụ na nke edegharịrị, mgbe Dolly Parton gachara “I Ga-ahụ gị n'anya mgbe niile. " Na chaatị Billboard ndị ọzọ, "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ (Taylor's Version)" topped Digital Song Sales (Swift's record-extending 22nd number one), Country Digital Song Sales (ndekọ-na-agbatị 15th nọmba otu), na Country Streaming Songs. Egwu a rụpụtara na elu na nọmba 11 na Billboard Hot 100, ntinye ihe ndekọ ya nke 129th.[210] Ndekọgharịgharị ahụ ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ asaa na Billboard Global 200.[56] Ọ tolitere chaatị nke otu na Malaysia[211] wee ruo 10 kachasị na Canada, [75] Ireland, [212] na Singapore.[213]. Ọ dekwara na nọmba 12 na UK, [214] ebe enyere ya ikike Silver, [215] na nọmba 18 na New Zealand.[216]

N'October 2021, Billboard kọrọ ụlọ ọrụ redio dị na U.S. na-akpọ "Ịhụnanya Akụkọ (Taylor's Version)" na ndekọgharị ndị ọzọ na-adịkarịghị atụnyere nke mbụ; ihe kpatara ya bụ na ihe ndekọgharịgharị ndị ahụ akọwapụtachaghị nke ọma, na ha enwechaghị mmasị ndị na-ege ntị maka egwu ochie Swift karịa nke ọhụrụ ya, ọ na-esikwa ike ịhazi ha n'ụdị usoro redio.[217]. Na 2022 CMT Music Awards, ndekọgharị ọzọ meriri Trending Comeback Song nke afọ mbụ; CMT kere ụdị ahụ iji sọpụrụ "kpakpando akara ngosi na ihe egwu ha nke na-abụghị naanị na-anwale oge mana hụkwara ewu ewu ọhụrụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya"[218].

title: Henryk Jan Dominiak Musée de Art professionnel miniature min bɛ Tychy
text:
Henryk Jan Dominiak Musée de Art professionnel miniature min bɛ Tychy ye Poland ka musée ye d'art moderne et d'art contemporain min bɛ Tychy min bɛ Eropaka Jɛkulu. Mise ka fɛnw lajɛlenw be taa 1000 ye minnu bɛ jira (2023). Musée in ɲasinnen ja fitininw, ja, ja, jɛgɛn ani seramiki dalajɛli ka bɔ Poland, Swedi, Ukrain, Hɔngiri ani Brazil.

Fotow lajɛyɔrɔ min kɔnɔ, mise jirali misɛnninw bɛ yen

Sababou

title: Mustapha Ishak Boushaki
text:
Mustapha Ishak Boushaki (1967, Bouira, Alizeri).

Mogo kalanen don ba. Tun ye hakili tigi ye laboratoire la. Ale jiginna Alizeri la, san ba kelen keme segin ani biwolofila ni kononto. A togo bora mun na. O ye hakilina caman caman ye.

title: Shrikant Rana
text:
Shrikant Rana ye Ɛndu sɛbɛnnikɛla ani karamɔgɔ ye min lakodɔnnen don a ka poyi Meri Tamanna fɛ.

A Bangera 1994 sàn awirilikalo tle 30 Saharanpur, Uttar Pradesh. A y’a ka kalan ban ɔridinatɛri dɔnniya la Chaudhary Charan Singh Iniwɛrisite la, Meerut ani ka kalan ban kɔfɛ jago la Maa Shakumbhari Iniwɛrisite la.
